MESSAGE.JP: 中庭に行くことにしよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to go out to the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to go out to the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は教室を出た。
MESSAGE.EN: I left the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I left the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 中庭にいる西園さんに、早速声をかける。
MESSAGE.EN: As soon as I arrived, I spotted Nishizono-san and said.
MESSAGE.Translation: As soon as I arrived, I spotted Nishizono-san and said.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これ、ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thank you for this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thank you for this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本を返すと同時に、僕はついあくびをしてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't help letting out a yawn even as I handed over the book to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't help letting out a yawn even as I handed over the book to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…授業でも居眠りで注意されてましたね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...You were told off for dozing off in class.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...You were told off for dozing off in class.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あはは、なかなか読むのがやめられなくて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ahaha, I could hardly put down the book last night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ahaha, I could hardly put down the book last night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「気づいたら、明け方近くになってたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And before I knew it, it was already morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And before I knew it, it was already morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…やっぱり、眠いね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...And, sure enough, I'm pretty sleepy now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...And, sure enough, I'm pretty sleepy now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 土曜日の疲れも残っていたのに、我ながら無謀なことをしたものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: What an absurd thing I've done in spite of how I wore myself out last Saturday...
MESSAGE.Translation: What an absurd thing I've done in spite of how I wore myself out last Saturday...

MESSAGE.JP: それだけ面白かったのだから、仕方ないけど。
MESSAGE.EN: The book was, however, absorbing enough to make me forego sleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: The book was, however, absorbing enough to make me forego sleep.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「気持ちは分かりますが…睡眠はちゃんと取らないといけませんよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I know your feeling... But you should make sure to get sufficient sleep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I know your feeling... But you should make sure to get sufficient sleep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「午後の授業は大丈夫ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Do you think you can stay awake during the afternoon classes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Do you think you can stay awake during the afternoon classes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、まあなんとかなるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I think so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I think so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…多分、ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...May... be.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...May... be.❞

MESSAGE.JP: あくびをかみ殺しながら、僕は呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Even as I muttered the reply, I had to suppress another yawn.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even as I muttered the reply, I had to suppress another yawn.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それにしても、ちょっと変わった話だったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The story was rather eccentric, by the way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The story was rather eccentric, by the way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「酒場で聞いたなんでもない一言から事件の真相を推理するなんて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Actually, I was surprised that the detective finally cracked the case based only on some minute conversation in a bar.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Actually, I was surprised that the detective finally cracked the case based only on some minute conversation in a bar.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「こんな推理小説もあるんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I've never read that sort of mystery novel before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I've never read that sort of mystery novel before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「これは『安楽椅子探偵（アームチェア・ディテクティブ）』というジャンルのミステリです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝This is a mystery genre called the ❛Armchair Detective.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝This is a mystery genre called the ❛Armchair Detective.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あーむちありーで…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Arm... er... cheerleading...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Arm... er... cheerleading...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんだか舌を噛みそうな名前だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't repeat the term she had mentioned.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't repeat the term she had mentioned.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…チアリーディングではありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...It's not cheerleading.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...It's not cheerleading.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「アームチェア・ディテクティブ。アームチェアとは安楽椅子のことです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's ❛Armchair Detective.❜ An armchair is a chair with arm rests.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's ❛Armchair Detective.❜ An armchair is a chair with arm rests.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ああ、暖炉の前によく置いてありそうな椅子のことかな。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, that must be the type of chair which you can often find in front of a fireplace in a western-style house.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, that must be the type of chair which you can often find in front of a fireplace in a western-style house.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、それと推理小説に何の関係があるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But what does that have to do with mysteries?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But what does that have to do with mysteries?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「実際に現場には行かないで、他人から聞いた話の中の僅かな手がかりから、純粋に論理のみで真相を推理する」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The detective in those novels reaches the truth through purely logical conjecture based only on what he hears from the people involved, never actually visiting the crime scene.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The detective in those novels reaches the truth through purely logical conjecture based only on what he hears from the people involved, never actually visiting the crime scene.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「つまり、安楽椅子に座っているだけで事件を解決する探偵という意味です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝To put it simply, he cracks the cases while relaxing in his armchair.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝To put it simply, he cracks the cases while relaxing in his armchair.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「この手のロジカルに展開する推理小説は、うまくかみ合えば膝を打って驚くことは請け合いです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I guarantee that if you like things like that, you'll be impressed by the irrefutable logic of how he forms a conclusion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I guarantee that if you like things like that, you'll be impressed by the irrefutable logic of how he forms a conclusion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「お気に召したなら、また何かお貸ししましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If you'd like, I can lend you another.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If you'd like, I can lend you another.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あの、なにか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝What might be the matter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝What might be the matter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 返事をしない僕に、西園さんが怪訝な顔をする。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked askance at me, as I hadn't responded to her offer.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked askance at me, as I hadn't responded to her offer.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ううん、なんでもないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it's nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it's nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「また、貸してくれるかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can you lend me another one later?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can you lend me another one later?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい、喜んで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Sure, I'd be happy to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Sure, I'd be happy to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 多分、僕の顔はちょっとにやけていたと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I must have been smiling at her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I must have been smiling at her.

MESSAGE.JP: だって、西園さんの顔は楽しそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Because she herself had appeared so pleased.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because she herself had appeared so pleased.

MESSAGE.JP: 本の話をする時の西園さんの顔が、素敵だと思ったから。
MESSAGE.EN: Whenever she talks about books, there's a certain charm about Nishizono-san's face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Whenever she talks about books, there's a certain charm about Nishizono-san's face.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の顔まで、つい緩んでしまったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: For that reason, I couldn't help softening my expression as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: For that reason, I couldn't help softening my expression as well.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おう、理樹じゃねえか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh hey, if it isn't Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh hey, if it isn't Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: サンドイッチを摘んでいると、今日は真人が通りかかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato came walking to us as I was biting into a sandwich.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato came walking to us as I was biting into a sandwich.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「西園も一緒か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝And Nishizono too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝And Nishizono too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんも軽く頭を下げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She inclined her head slightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She inclined her head slightly.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「こんなところで昼飯食ってたのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Didn't know you guys were doing lunch at a place like this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Didn't know you guys were doing lunch at a place like this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…うまそうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...That looks yummy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...That looks yummy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人の視線は、僕が持っているサンドイッチに向けられていた。
MESSAGE.EN: He was gazing at the sandwich I was holding in my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was gazing at the sandwich I was holding in my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、これは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, you can't have it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, you can't have it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「一個ぐらい、ケチケチするなよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Just one bite. Don't be so stingy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Just one bite. Don't be so stingy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ダメだってば、もう最後なんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, this is the last one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, this is the last one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえは、親友が飢えに苦しんでるのに助けてくれないのかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You gonna abandon a friend into the maw of hunger?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You gonna abandon a friend into the maw of hunger?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「今はなんとか筋肉で持ちこたえている状態だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm somehow just barely keeping myself standing with my muscles for the time being...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm somehow just barely keeping myself standing with my muscles for the time being...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それだけの筋肉なら一ヶ月ぐらいは持ちそうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Considering that amount of muscle you've got, I think you could survive for another month.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Considering that amount of muscle you've got, I think you could survive for another month.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「お、言ってくれるな、理樹めっ、そうそうこれぐらい鍛えていれば一ヶ月ぐらいなにも食わないでも生きていける」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, nice guess, bro. That's damned right. With muscles as well-trained as mine, you can keep alive for a month without food.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, nice guess, bro. That's damned right. With muscles as well-trained as mine, you can keep alive for a month without food.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「じゃあな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝See ya.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝See ya.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 満足げに去っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: He walked away contentedly.
MESSAGE.Translation: He walked away contentedly.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「死ぬだろっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm gonna die!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm gonna die!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわあ、戻ってきたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwah, you're back!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwah, you're back!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「危うくプライドの高さゆえ飢え死にするところだったぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I was about to die from hunger due to this inflated pride of mine...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I was about to die from hunger due to this inflated pride of mine...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「理樹、罰だ、食わせろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Riki, you must be punished. Give me that sandwich.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki, you must be punished. Give me that sandwich.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とにかく、これは僕の分…って、あー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it's min... Ahh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it's min... Ahh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 隙をつかれて、一口持っていかれる。
MESSAGE.EN: Having caught me off guard, he stole a bite of my sandwich.
MESSAGE.Translation: Having caught me off guard, he stole a bite of my sandwich.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うまい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yum.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yum.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「だが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…少しだけ食うと、余計に腹が減るな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Hunger grows while eating. I'm only feeling more starved than before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Hunger grows while eating. I'm only feeling more starved than before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひとつのサンドイッチを巡って僕らは対峙する。
MESSAGE.EN: The two of us were standing face to face now, vying for dominance over the sandwich.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two of us were standing face to face now, vying for dominance over the sandwich.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「絡み合う瞳と瞳」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Two men staring each other in the eye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Two men staring each other in the eye.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「目と目で通じ合うふたり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Communicating without words.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Communicating without words.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …少し離れた場所から声が聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Someone was saying something nearby.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Someone was saying something nearby.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが、じぃっとこちらを見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san was fixedly gazing at us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san was fixedly gazing at us.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…美しくないです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...It's not beautiful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...It's not beautiful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「井ノ原さん×直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Inohara-san X Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Inohara-san X Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…力ずくはダメです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Using force is not good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Using force is not good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「こんなの日常茶飯事だぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Even if that's what we've always done?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Even if that's what we've always done?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…ダメです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...You shouldn't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...You shouldn't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 気圧されてか、真人は僕にかじりかけのサンドイッチを返す。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato handed me back the half-bitten sandwich, apparently overwhelmed by her attitude.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato handed me back the half-bitten sandwich, apparently overwhelmed by her attitude.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「お、オーケー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝O-okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝O-okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「じゃあな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝See ya...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝See ya...❞

MESSAGE.JP: こっちを見ながら去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: He walked away with his eyes fixed upon her.
MESSAGE.Translation: He walked away with his eyes fixed upon her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あの真人に言うことを利かすなんて、すごいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm impressed by the way you handled him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm impressed by the way you handled him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…特になにもしてませんが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I didn't do anything special.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I didn't do anything special.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 自覚がないのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Gosh, she isn't even aware of it...
MESSAGE.Translation: Gosh, she isn't even aware of it...

MESSAGE.JP: 何かものすごく熱いものを感じたけど。
MESSAGE.EN: But even I felt the burning heat from her...
MESSAGE.Translation: But even I felt the burning heat from her...

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹、ちょっといいか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, got a moment?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, got a moment?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 帰ろうとしたところで、恭介に呼び止められる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke caught me as I was leaving the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke caught me as I was leaving the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「実は、相談があるんだがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Truth be told, I've got something to...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Truth be told, I've got something to...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言いかけて言葉を止め、近づいてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: He broke off in mid-sentence and approached me.
MESSAGE.Translation: He broke off in mid-sentence and approached me.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…ちょっと、そのままじっとしてろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Just hold still.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Just hold still.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 息のかかる距離に恭介の顔があった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke's face was so close I could feel his breath on me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke's face was so close I could feel his breath on me.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「糸くずがついてる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You've got a piece of lint there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You've got a piece of lint there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介が制服の襟に手をまわす。
MESSAGE.EN: His arm wrapped around my collar.
MESSAGE.Translation: His arm wrapped around my collar.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その手が僕の襟を払った。
MESSAGE.EN: And then he brushed off the thread with his hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then he brushed off the thread with his hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ようっ、西園」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yo, Nishizono.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yo, Nishizono.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その体勢のまま、恭介が耳元で声を出した。
MESSAGE.EN: Without moving, he spoke right next to my ear.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without moving, he spoke right next to my ear.

MESSAGE.JP: 吐く息が頬にかかる。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt his breath on my cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt his breath on my cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: 振り返ると、ちょうど西園さんがこちらを見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Turning my head, I found Nishizono-san staring at us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Turning my head, I found Nishizono-san staring at us.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしたの？　西園さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's up, Nishizono-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's up, Nishizono-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…おじゃまでしたか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Am I interrupting?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Am I interrupting?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いや、邪魔ってわけじゃないんだが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I wouldn't say you interrupted, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I wouldn't say you interrupted, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…どうするかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...What should I do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...What should I do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「やっ、やっぱり邪魔だったんですね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝S, so I was interrupting...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝S, so I was interrupting...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「西園も一緒の方が都合がいいか…
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Nishizono, I guess it might be better if you join u...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Nishizono, I guess it might be better if you join u...

MESSAGE.JP: って、おいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: Oh, hey!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh, hey!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介の言葉を最後まで聞かず、西園さんはいきなり走り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: She suddenly took off running before he could finish his words.
MESSAGE.Translation: She suddenly took off running before he could finish his words.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹、追えっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, after her!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, after her!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 突然のことに驚いていると、恭介が大きな声を出す。
MESSAGE.EN: He loudly barked the order at me, who had been stunned by her abrupt flight.
MESSAGE.Translation: He loudly barked the order at me, who had been stunned by her abrupt flight.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝O-okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝O-okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言われるまま、僕は遠ざかる西園さんの背中を追いかける。
MESSAGE.EN: I sprung in pursuit of her as directed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sprung in pursuit of her as directed.

MESSAGE.JP: 思いのほか、足が速い。
MESSAGE.EN: She was running much faster than I would have expected.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was running much faster than I would have expected.

MESSAGE.JP: あの華奢な体で、これほどの瞬発力があるとは思わなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: For her frail appearance, she was really fast on her feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: For her frail appearance, she was really fast on her feet.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「待ってよ、西園さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, wait!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, wait!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下を走り、階段を駆け下りる。
MESSAGE.EN: We were rushing through the hall and racing down the stairs.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were rushing through the hall and racing down the stairs.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「待ってってば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait!❞

MESSAGE.JP: これで待ってくれるならば、最初から逃げたりはしないだろうけど。
MESSAGE.EN: However, if I could make her stop just by shouting for her to wait, she wouldn't be getting away like this in the first place.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, if I could make her stop just by shouting for her to wait, she wouldn't be getting away like this in the first place.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らの距離はなかなか縮まらず、少し前を走る西園さんの背中は捕まらない。
MESSAGE.EN: Though there was little distance between us, I could hardly close in any further.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though there was little distance between us, I could hardly close in any further.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「廊下は走っちゃダメだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You mustn't run in the hallway!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You mustn't run in the hallway!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 自分も走っているのに、僕はとっさにそんなことを言った。
MESSAGE.EN: A spontaneous warning came out of my mouth despite the fact that I myself was running too.
MESSAGE.Translation: A spontaneous warning came out of my mouth despite the fact that I myself was running too.

MESSAGE.JP: すると。
MESSAGE.EN: In the next moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the next moment.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは急に立ち止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: And without any indication she was going to, she suddenly stopped.
MESSAGE.Translation: And without any indication she was going to, she suddenly stopped.

MESSAGE.JP: えっ。
MESSAGE.EN: What!?
MESSAGE.Translation: What!?

MESSAGE.JP: 車は急に止まれない。人も同じ。
MESSAGE.EN: A fast moving car needs some room to stop, and a fast moving human is no different.
MESSAGE.Translation: A fast moving car needs some room to stop, and a fast moving human is no different.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の足は、まだ走り続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: My legs kept running.
MESSAGE.Translation: My legs kept running.

MESSAGE.JP: 慌ててブレーキをかけるけれど、間に合わない。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to brake, but it was too late.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to brake, but it was too late.

MESSAGE.JP: 慣性の法則に従い、僕は前のめりになる。
MESSAGE.EN: Following the law of inertia, I began falling forward.
MESSAGE.Translation: Following the law of inertia, I began falling forward.

MESSAGE.JP: そのタイミングで、西園さんはこちらを向こうとしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Just then, she turned to face me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just then, she turned to face me.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりは、対面。
MESSAGE.EN: My eyes momentarily met hers.
MESSAGE.Translation: My eyes momentarily met hers.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、ぶつかる。
MESSAGE.EN: And then I crashed into her.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then I crashed into her.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が西園さんを押し倒すようにして、ふたりは廊下に転がった。
MESSAGE.EN: She and I fell down on the floor as though I'd pushed her down.
MESSAGE.Translation: She and I fell down on the floor as though I'd pushed her down.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ご、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So-sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So-sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が上になったために、自分の体で痛いところはない。
MESSAGE.EN: I had suffered no injury, since she had cushioned my fall.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had suffered no injury, since she had cushioned my fall.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「に、西園さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ni-Nishizono-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ni-Nishizono-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: でも、西園さんは声をかけても、気がつく気配がない。
MESSAGE.EN: She, on the other hand, was showing no sign of awareness.
MESSAGE.Translation: She, on the other hand, was showing no sign of awareness.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 返事がない。
MESSAGE.EN: She did not answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: She did not answer.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは目を閉じたまま、文字通り眠ったみたいに廊下で仰向けに倒れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was lying down on her back with her eyes closed, looking literally asleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was lying down on her back with her eyes closed, looking literally asleep.

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「…少年、キミは往来の真ん中で何をやってるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝...What in the name of all things holy are you doing right in the middle of the hallway, young man?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝...What in the name of all things holy are you doing right in the middle of the hallway, young man?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 頭上から涼しげな、声がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard a placid voice from overhead.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard a placid voice from overhead.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「く、来ヶ谷さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ku-Kurugaya-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ku-Kurugaya-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「その、西園さんが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, let me explain.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, let me explain.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「が？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Mm-h?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Mm-h?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いきなり逃げて、逃げられたから追いかけたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She suddenly started fleeing from me and Kyousuke, and I chased after and tried to catch her in order to ask why.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She suddenly started fleeing from me and Kyousuke, and I chased after and tried to catch her in order to ask why.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ふむ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Uh-huh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Uh-huh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「追いかけて捕まえようとしたら、西園さんが突然立ち止まって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But she suddenly stopped dead on the way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But she suddenly stopped dead on the way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ほう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝O-ho.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝O-ho.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「その…押し倒したら、西園さんが気絶しちゃったみたいで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝After that... I crashed into her, and it looks like she passed out...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝After that... I crashed into her, and it looks like she passed out...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なるほどな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あの…理解してくれる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um... You understand now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um... You understand now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、キミが変態だということは十分に理解した」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Sure, I've perfectly understood that you are a pervert.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Sure, I've perfectly understood that you are a pervert.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうじゃないってば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's not what I was saying...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's not what I was saying...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「冗談だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Just kidding.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Just kidding.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …来ヶ谷さんの冗談は心臓に悪い。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Her jokes never failed to freak me out.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Her jokes never failed to freak me out.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まずは西園女史から離れることをお勧めするが、どうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Might I suggest you get off of her, first of all?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Might I suggest you get off of her, first of all?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はずっと西園さんの上に乗ったままだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I still hadn't moved from where I was sprawled over Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I still hadn't moved from where I was sprawled over Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の体の下にある、西園さんの体。
MESSAGE.EN: Right underneath me was her body.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right underneath me was her body.

MESSAGE.JP: あたたかい。
MESSAGE.EN: It was warm.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was warm.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「特に、キミの右手は随分とうらやま…非常識な位置にあるように見受けられるが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Especially your right hand seems to be located somewhere very excell... I mean, very insensitive.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Especially your right hand seems to be located somewhere very excell... I mean, very insensitive.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 左手は廊下の床についている。
MESSAGE.EN: My left hand was on the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: My left hand was on the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: 右手は…西園さんの制服の上。胸ポケットのあたり。
MESSAGE.EN: And my right hand was... on Nishizono-san's uniform, somewhere near the chest pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: And my right hand was... on Nishizono-san's uniform, somewhere near the chest pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: 胸ということは、当然…。その、女の子なんだから。
MESSAGE.EN: Which obviously meant... well, because she's a girl, it was...
MESSAGE.Translation: Which obviously meant... well, because she's a girl, it was...

MESSAGE.JP: あれ、でも、あんまりそれらしい感触が…。
MESSAGE.EN: Huh? Hold on a sec, I don't think I'm feeling what I think should be there...
MESSAGE.Translation: Huh? Hold on a sec, I don't think I'm feeling what I think should be there...

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なにを楽しそうな事をしてるんだキミは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You seem to be having fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You seem to be having fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ、いや、そんなつもりは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, no, I didn't mean to...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, no, I didn't mean to...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 感触がないから、た、確かめようとしたのか、僕は。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, I get it. Because I couldn't feel it, I instinctively tried to find it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, I get it. Because I couldn't feel it, I instinctively tried to find it.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、だがそんなことよりも優先すべきことがあるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, but there's something more important you have to do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, but there's something more important you have to do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「頭を打ってたら大変だ。すぐに$K34保健室$K0に連れていこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It can be a serious problem if she hit her head. Let's take her to the $K34Infirmary$K0 right away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It can be a serious problem if she hit her head. Let's take her to the $K34Infirmary$K0 right away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その言葉には、全面的に同意する。
MESSAGE.EN: That was one proposal of hers I completely agreed with.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was one proposal of hers I completely agreed with.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「少年、キミが運んでゆくといい。それが礼儀というものだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Young man, you should take her. That's only right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Young man, you should take her. That's only right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん、触るね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, allow me to carry you to the infirmary.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, allow me to carry you to the infirmary.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一応、断りを入れる。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to ask her just in case.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to ask her just in case.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…お断りします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I decline.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I decline.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 返事があるとは思わなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I did not expect a response.
MESSAGE.Translation: I did not expect a response.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よかった、目が覚めたんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, thank God you woke up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, thank God you woke up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい、だいじょうぶです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes, I'm good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes, I'm good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 頷いた西園さんの琥珀色の瞳が僕を正面から捉える。
MESSAGE.EN: As she nodded, her amber eyes captured me squarely.
MESSAGE.Translation: As she nodded, her amber eyes captured me squarely.

MESSAGE.JP: まだ幾分ぼんやりした瞳が、瞬間的に僕にピントを合わせた。
MESSAGE.EN: And then she quickly adjusted her still somewhat out-of-focus eyes upon my face.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then she quickly adjusted her still somewhat out-of-focus eyes upon my face.

MESSAGE.JP: 真っ直ぐなその視線に、僕は吸い込まれるように引きつけられる。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt like I was getting drawn into those eyes, which were staring straight at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt like I was getting drawn into those eyes, which were staring straight at me.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…直枝さん、いつまでそうしているつもりですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Naoe-san, when are you going to move?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Naoe-san, when are you going to move?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「重いです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You're heavy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You're heavy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それに、何より…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And more importantly...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And more importantly...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの瞳が僕の右手に向けられる。
MESSAGE.EN: She shot a look at my right hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shot a look at my right hand.

MESSAGE.JP: し、しまった。
MESSAGE.EN: H-holy crap.
MESSAGE.Translation: H-holy crap.

MESSAGE.JP: 忘れてた。
MESSAGE.EN: I forgot about that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I forgot about that.

MESSAGE.JP: ………視線が痛い。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The way her eyes bore into me felt like needles.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The way her eyes bore into me felt like needles.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ともかく、どいてください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Could you possibly move?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Could you possibly move?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ご、ご、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So-so-sorry!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So-so-sorry!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 慌てて体を起こした。
MESSAGE.EN: I got up in a fluster.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got up in a fluster.

MESSAGE.JP: 念のため保健室に寄ったが、特に異常はないとのことだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Though she went to see the infirmary just in case, it turned out she was okay.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though she went to see the infirmary just in case, it turned out she was okay.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大事がなくてよかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm relieved that you're fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm relieved that you're fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 隣を歩く西園さんは、なにやら不機嫌そうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san, who was walking abreast of me, looked in somewhat of a foul mood.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san, who was walking abreast of me, looked in somewhat of a foul mood.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あの、西園さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san...?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あの、西園美魚さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Mio Nishizono-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Mio Nishizono-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「はっはっは、すっかり嫌われてしまったようだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hah-hah-hah, looks like she completely hates your guts now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hah-hah-hah, looks like she completely hates your guts now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「美魚君も、こんな助平な男はうっちゃった方が身のためだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Mio-kun, it's best for your own good to ignore a horny letch like him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Mio-kun, it's best for your own good to ignore a horny letch like him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、あれは事故なんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, that was an accident...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, that was an accident...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ほんと、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm really sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm really sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…何度も謝っていただかなくても、結構です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...You don't have to apologize over and over again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...You don't have to apologize over and over again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「その…いきなり走り出したわたしも悪いのですし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Well... I'm partially responsible as well, since I was the one who started to run.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Well... I'm partially responsible as well, since I was the one who started to run.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さんこそ、怒っているのではないですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Are you sure YOU are not mad at me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Are you sure YOU are not mad at me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕が？　どうして？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, what would make you think that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, what would make you think that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「い、いえ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Ne-never mind...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Ne-never mind...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そう言えば、なんで逃げたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why did you run away from us in the first place?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why did you run away from us in the first place?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 正直ちょっとショックだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Honestly, that had shocked me a little.
MESSAGE.Translation: Honestly, that had shocked me a little.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…逃げたわけではありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I wasn't running away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I wasn't running away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ただ、ちょっと…驚いてしまったもので」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I was just... a little surprised.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I was just... a little surprised.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんで？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How come?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How come?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「恭介さんと直枝さんが、き、き、き」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You and him were about to ki-ki-ki...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You and him were about to ki-ki-ki...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「きつつき？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eat kimchi?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eat kimchi?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ではなくて、き、き、き」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No, I mean ki-ki-KI...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No, I mean ki-ki-KI...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「嫌い嫌いも好きのうち？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Play Kingis Khan?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Play Kingis Khan?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ああ、やっぱりそうなんですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Ah, I knew it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Ah, I knew it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひとり納得される。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed to have come to grasps with something.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed to have come to grasps with something.

MESSAGE.JP: さっぱり、わからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no idea what was going on in her mind, though.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no idea what was going on in her mind, though.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「夢が現実に置き換わった…そんな不思議な心持ちです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝One of my dreams has thus become reality... 'Tis an indescribable feeling I'm having right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝One of my dreams has thus become reality... 'Tis an indescribable feeling I'm having right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…恭介さんとなら、応援しますよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I will be cheering you two on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I will be cheering you two on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「お似合いですものね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's a great match.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's a great match.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あの、西園さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えと…何を言っているか、さっぱりわからないんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... I don't know what you're talking about at all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... I don't know what you're talking about at all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんはひとりで、うんうんと頷いている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san was, on the other hand, nodding with approval.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san was, on the other hand, nodding with approval.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「分かってるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did you figure out what she meant?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did you figure out what she meant?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「少年。想像をするのはたやすいことなのだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Young man, it is a simple task to use your imagination.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Young man, it is a simple task to use your imagination.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「知識と直感さえあれば、な」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝So long as you have knowledge and intuition.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝So long as you have knowledge and intuition.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「私と美魚君とは、ルビンの杯の関係のようだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝The relation between Mio-kun and I can be viewed as the Rubin's Goblet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝The relation between Mio-kun and I can be viewed as the Rubin's Goblet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…なるほど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Interesting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Interesting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「来ヶ谷さんは、そちらですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝So you're on that side, Kurugaya-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝So you're on that side, Kurugaya-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「私は主に実践だが。美魚君は文献派かな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I mostly value practice. But you seem to be inclined toward theory.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I mostly value practice. But you seem to be inclined toward theory.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「どちらかと言えば、そうですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If I had to pick, that's true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If I had to pick, that's true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「来ヶ谷さんとは良い関係が結べそうです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I think we will get along just fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I think we will get along just fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「実践派としては堪らない台詞だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝As one devoted to practice, I'd like to capitalize on that remark.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝As one devoted to practice, I'd like to capitalize on that remark.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…それはちょっと遠慮したいですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I'd have to politely decline.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I'd have to politely decline.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんか通じ合ってるみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: They seemed to be on the same wavelength.
MESSAGE.Translation: They seemed to be on the same wavelength.

MESSAGE.JP: ひとり、置いてけぼりだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I had been left out of the loop this entire time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had been left out of the loop this entire time.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「送っていこうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let me take you to the dorm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let me take you to the dorm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何ごともなかった、とは言え。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though she seemed to be fine.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though she seemed to be fine.

MESSAGE.JP: ぶつかって気絶させてしまったのは、僕の責任だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to take responsibility for making her pass out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to take responsibility for making her pass out.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…心配いりません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...No cause for concern.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...No cause for concern.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それに送るもなにも…寮はすぐそこです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The dorm is right over there... after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The dorm is right over there... after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだけど…それでも、なにもしないと僕の気が済まないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝True... But I still can't forgive myself if I don't do something for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝True... But I still can't forgive myself if I don't do something for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…くすっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Eheh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Eheh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが小さく笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave a soft laugh.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave a soft laugh.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そう言えば、あの日も直枝さんがわたしにボールをぶつけたんですよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Speaking of which, you do remember the day you hit me with a baseball?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Speaking of which, you do remember the day you hit me with a baseball?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あっ、そうだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が西園さんに声をかけたきっかけ。
MESSAGE.EN: That was how I had come to speak with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was how I had come to speak with her.

MESSAGE.JP: あの時はボールをぶつけた。
MESSAGE.EN: Back when I hit her with a baseball.
MESSAGE.Translation: Back when I hit her with a baseball.

MESSAGE.JP: そして今日は僕自身が…。
MESSAGE.EN: And today, myself...
MESSAGE.Translation: And today, myself...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、本当に重ね重ねごめんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sorry. I really am.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sorry. I really am.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…すみません、わたしこそ。そんなつもりではありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I'm sorry, too. I didn't intend to elicit another apology.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I'm sorry, too. I didn't intend to elicit another apology.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ただ、ちょっと思い出しただけです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I just happened to recall it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I just happened to recall it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「まだ、二週間と経っていないんですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It hasn't been even two weeks since then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It hasn't been even two weeks since then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: チームを結成して、みんなが集まって、西園さんがマネージャーで加わって、練習をして、そしてつい一昨日には試合までした。
MESSAGE.EN: The team was formed. The members were gathered. Nishizono-san joined the team as the manager. We practiced a lot. We even played a game just two days ago.
MESSAGE.Translation: The team was formed. The members were gathered. Nishizono-san joined the team as the manager. We practiced a lot. We even played a game just two days ago.

MESSAGE.JP: 長いようだけど、わずか二週間ばかりのできごとだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like a long time had passed, though all those things happened over just the last two weeks.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like a long time had passed, though all those things happened over just the last two weeks.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「試合は終わりましたけど、まだ野球はするんでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The match is over, but are we going to continue playing baseball?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The match is over, but are we going to continue playing baseball?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…どうかな。恭介がなにを考えてるかはよくわかんないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Well, I don't know what Kyousuke's plans are.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Well, I don't know what Kyousuke's plans are.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さっきも、なにか話があるみたいだったよ。西園さんにもね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But it looked like he wanted to talk to us about something before the chase.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But it looked like he wanted to talk to us about something before the chase.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そう、だったんですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Did... he?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Did... he?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「てっきり、おふたりの邪魔をしてしまったものだとばかり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I was certain I was interrupting the two of you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I was certain I was interrupting the two of you.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........Um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........Um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…わたし、早とちりですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Did I get the wrong idea?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Did I get the wrong idea?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「早とちりって言うか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What should I say...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What should I say...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが何を誤解したのかすら、僕にはわからないんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: In the first place, I still don't understand what she thought was happening.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the first place, I still don't understand what she thought was happening.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そう、ですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝All... right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝All... right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんか、少し落ち込んでる。
MESSAGE.EN: She appeared a little bit dejected.
MESSAGE.Translation: She appeared a little bit dejected.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ああ、でも良いものを見せていただきました。眼福、眼福」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Ah, but thank you for letting me see something wonderful. It was a sight for sore eyes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Ah, but thank you for letting me see something wonderful. It was a sight for sore eyes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: と思ったら、なぜか拝まれた。
MESSAGE.EN: And even now, what was she thanking me for?
MESSAGE.Translation: And even now, what was she thanking me for?

MESSAGE.JP: …それにしても、いったい恭介は何を考えているんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...What in the world was Kyousuke thinking, anyways?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What in the world was Kyousuke thinking, anyways?

MESSAGE.JP: 先日、試合は終わった。
MESSAGE.EN: We had finished the game the other day.
MESSAGE.Translation: We had finished the game the other day.

MESSAGE.JP: 強引に引っ張り込んだような形で入った西園さんは…果たして、これからも僕たちに付き合ってくれるんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Since I had practically forced Nishizono-san to help us, I wondered if she would continue to hang out with us...
MESSAGE.Translation: Since I had practically forced Nishizono-san to help us, I wondered if she would continue to hang out with us...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「明日、もう一度恭介に訊いてみようよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Guess we should ask Kyousuke tomorrow what he wanted.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Guess we should ask Kyousuke tomorrow what he wanted.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうしたら、また付き合ってくれるかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Will you join me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Will you join me?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは静かに微笑む。
MESSAGE.EN: She smiled quietly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She smiled quietly.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の言葉を受け入れてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: She accepted my words.
MESSAGE.Translation: She accepted my words.

MESSAGE.JP: そう思わせる笑みだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That was what the smile seemed to say.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was what the smile seemed to say.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「では、また明日。おやすみなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝See you tomorrow, and good night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝See you tomorrow, and good night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、おやすみ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小さくなる後ろ姿を見送った後。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw her off.
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw her off.

MESSAGE.JP: 何とはなしに、辺りを見る。
MESSAGE.EN: And then casually looked around.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then casually looked around.

MESSAGE.JP: 綺麗な夕焼けだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The sunset was lovely.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sunset was lovely.

MESSAGE.JP: 見慣れた風景が、見慣れた色に染まる。
MESSAGE.EN: A familiar scenery dyed in a familiar color.
MESSAGE.Translation: A familiar scenery dyed in a familiar color.

MESSAGE.JP: 今日も晴れだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Today had been another nice day.
MESSAGE.Translation: Today had been another nice day.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、明日もきっと晴れるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: And so would tomorrow.
MESSAGE.Translation: And so would tomorrow.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな確信が持てる、そんな空だった。
MESSAGE.EN: The sky assured me of that.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sky assured me of that.

MESSAGE.JP: 『変わらない』なんて、ない。
MESSAGE.EN: There isn't anything that will stay the same forever.
MESSAGE.Translation: There isn't anything that will stay the same forever.

MESSAGE.JP: 晴れの日が、永遠に続くことがないように。
MESSAGE.EN: Even sunny days don't last forever.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even sunny days don't last forever.

MESSAGE.JP: 今日の確信が、明日には幻になってしまうことがある。
MESSAGE.EN: The assurance you have today can turn into an illusion tomorrow.
MESSAGE.Translation: The assurance you have today can turn into an illusion tomorrow.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はそれを知っているはずだったのに。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought I knew that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought I knew that.

MESSAGE.JP: 夕食前。
MESSAGE.EN: Before dinner.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before dinner.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんを呼んで、今日の事を話すことにする。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to call on Kurugaya-san and talk to her about today.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to call on Kurugaya-san and talk to her about today.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…呆れたものだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I can't believe my ears...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I can't believe my ears...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言葉通り、心底呆れた表情で言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She said with genuine amazement.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said with genuine amazement.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「あいわかった。これは私の問題だな。何とかしておこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Aye, I got it. This is my problem. I will do something about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Aye, I got it. This is my problem. I will do something about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大丈夫なの？　何か助けが必要だったらいつでも手を貸すけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Will you be okay? I can give you a hand if you need help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Will you be okay? I can give you a hand if you need help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「失敬だな、キミの手を借りるほど落ちぶれてはいないぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝How rude. I won't stoop so low as to ask for your help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝How rude. I won't stoop so low as to ask for your help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「大体、私に泣きついてきたのはキミだろう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Besides, wasn't it you who came crying to me for help?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Besides, wasn't it you who came crying to me for help?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…まったく、しょうがないな理樹君は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Goodness, you're such a handful, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Goodness, you're such a handful, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …ひどく穏やかな表情でそう言われる。
MESSAGE.EN: She replied with an awfully calm expression.
MESSAGE.Translation: She replied with an awfully calm expression.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、よく平気だね来ヶ谷さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I'm surprised you're so calm, Kurugaya-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I'm surprised you're so calm, Kurugaya-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ん、何がだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Mm, what do you mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Mm, what do you mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「結構へこんだよ、画鋲とか仕込まれてるだけで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was pretty depressed from just getting those thumbtacks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was pretty depressed from just getting those thumbtacks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「言ったろ、私はそこらへんの人間がただ動いてしゃべってるもの、位にしか思えん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I told you before didn't I, for me most people are just entities capable of moving and speaking, that's all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I told you before didn't I, for me most people are just entities capable of moving and speaking, that's all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…自分とて例外ではない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...I am no different myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...I am no different myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「そうだな、今の野球チームの面々はちょっと別だがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝That's true, the members of our baseball team are a little different matter.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝That's true, the members of our baseball team are a little different matter.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…面白いものを始めてくれたものだよ、キミは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You really did start something interesting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You really did start something interesting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はっはっは、と笑い僕の肩を叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: She laughed heartily and clapped me on the shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: She laughed heartily and clapped me on the shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「というわけでおねーさんに任せておけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝That's why, leave the rest to Onee-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝That's why, leave the rest to Onee-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言い残し、来ヶ谷さんは去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: With that message, Kurugaya-san walked off.
MESSAGE.Translation: With that message, Kurugaya-san walked off.

MESSAGE.JP: 無敵なのだろうか、あの人は。
MESSAGE.EN: This person just might be invincible.
MESSAGE.Translation: This person just might be invincible.

MESSAGE.JP: その夜の寮。
MESSAGE.EN: Later that night, in the dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: Later that night, in the dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: …なんか、女子寮のほうが騒がしい。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a lot of noise coming from the girls' dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a lot of noise coming from the girls' dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ん、なんだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm, what's that about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm, what's that about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うるせぇな、おちおちスクワットも出来やしねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝They're too loud, I can't even do squats properly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝They're too loud, I can't even do squats properly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いや、それは静かじゃなくても出来ることだと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't really think doing squats requires absolute silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't really think doing squats requires absolute silence.

MESSAGE.JP: …と、僕の携帯に着信。
MESSAGE.EN: ...An email arrived on my phone.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...An email arrived on my phone.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「メールだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝An email...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝An email...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 開いてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened my cellphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened my cellphone.

MESSAGE.JP: 差出人：来ヶ谷　唯湖$dタイトル：『無題』
MESSAGE.EN:
Sender: Yuiko Kurugaya
Subject: [No subject]
MESSAGE.Translation:
Sender: Yuiko Kurugaya
Subject: [No subject]

MESSAGE.JP: 本文：『ミッションコンプリート』
MESSAGE.EN: Message: [Mission Complete.]
MESSAGE.Translation: Message: [Mission Complete.]

MESSAGE.JP: 一瞬理解できない。
MESSAGE.EN: It took a moment to realize what that meant.
MESSAGE.Translation: It took a moment to realize what that meant.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、あの騒ぎ、来ヶ谷さんか！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, all that commotion, it was Kurugaya-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, all that commotion, it was Kurugaya-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ああ？　あいつがなんかやったのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh? What did she do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh? What did she do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、わかんないけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I don't know really...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I don't know really...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何をしたか気になるけど、訊かないほうがいいような気もした。
MESSAGE.EN: I was worried about what she'd done, but I had a feeling I was better off not knowing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was worried about what she'd done, but I had a feeling I was better off not knowing.

MESSAGE.JP: …ホントに、あの人だけは敵に回しちゃいけないんだな…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It'd really be a bad idea to get on her bad side...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It'd really be a bad idea to get on her bad side...

MESSAGE.JP: 授業の終わりを知らせるチャイムが鳴り、購買に向かう生徒がダッシュで教室を出て行く。
MESSAGE.EN: As soon as they heard the bell signal the end of the last morning class, some classmates left the classroom and made a mad dash for the school store.
MESSAGE.Translation: As soon as they heard the bell signal the end of the last morning class, some classmates left the classroom and made a mad dash for the school store.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんに声をかけようと、廊下側の席に向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: I walked up to Nishizono-san's desk to speak to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I walked up to Nishizono-san's desk to speak to her.

MESSAGE.JP: ドアに向かった女生徒が、ちょうど立ち上がった西園さんと接触する。
MESSAGE.EN: A female classmate bumped into Nishizono-san, who had stood up as the girl was passing by.
MESSAGE.Translation: A female classmate bumped into Nishizono-san, who had stood up as the girl was passing by.

MESSAGE.JP: 肩が触れあうくらいで、大したことではなかったけれど。
MESSAGE.EN: It was not a big deal; their shoulders just brushed each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was not a big deal; their shoulders just brushed each other.

MESSAGE.JP: `女生徒@「いたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝Ouch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝Ouch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女は顔をしかめて、ちょっと首を傾げるとそのまま教室から出て行ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: The girl frowned, cocking her head to the side, and walked out of the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: The girl frowned, cocking her head to the side, and walked out of the room.

MESSAGE.JP: …西園さんに謝りもしないで。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She didn't even apologize to Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She didn't even apologize to Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ひどいなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How rude.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How rude.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「なにがですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝What was?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝What was?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「一言、謝っていけばいいのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She should've apologized to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She should've apologized to you.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ちゃんと謝られましたよ。直枝さんが気づかなかっただけでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝She did. You must not have noticed it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝She did. You must not have noticed it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そうだった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 見てた限り、そんな様子はなかったけれど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Judging by what I saw, she did not...
MESSAGE.Translation: Judging by what I saw, she did not...

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが言うのならば、きっとそうなのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: But if she says so, it must have been so.
MESSAGE.Translation: But if she says so, it must have been so.

MESSAGE.JP: だから…きっと僕の勘違いだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Thus... I was just mistaken.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thus... I was just mistaken.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「お昼ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Are you going for lunch?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Are you going for lunch?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…よかったら、一緒に中庭まで行こうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... Can we go to the courtyard together?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... Can we go to the courtyard together?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: ご飯を食べ終わると、西園さんは読書を始める。
MESSAGE.EN: Having finished lunch, she had opened a book.
MESSAGE.Translation: Having finished lunch, she had opened a book.

MESSAGE.JP: すぐに僕の声も聞こえないくらいに熱中してしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: She was so absorbed in reading that she couldn't hear me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was so absorbed in reading that she couldn't hear me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…しょうがない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I have no choice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I have no choice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕も借りている本を、途中から読み始める。
MESSAGE.EN: I also started reading the book I had borrowed from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I also started reading the book I had borrowed from her.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんからもらったサンドイッチのパンを小さく千切って、寄ってくる鳥にあげる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was tearing the crust of the sandwich she had given me into crumbs, and feeding the birds around.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was tearing the crust of the sandwich she had given me into crumbs, and feeding the birds around.

MESSAGE.JP: 首を振りながら、それをついばむ鳩の姿は見ているだけで楽しい。
MESSAGE.EN: It was fun watching the pigeons bopping their heads as they pecked the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was fun watching the pigeons bopping their heads as they pecked the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: 今日も良い天気だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet another sunny day.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet another sunny day.

MESSAGE.JP: 抜けるような青空を見ていると、まるで晴れた日ばかりが永遠に続いていく気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: Gazing up to the bright blue sky made me feel as if these warm days would never end.
MESSAGE.Translation: Gazing up to the bright blue sky made me feel as if these warm days would never end.

MESSAGE.JP: ずっと、良いことばかり続けば良いのに。
MESSAGE.EN: I wished good things would keep happening forever.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wished good things would keep happening forever.

MESSAGE.JP: 一羽の鳥が、羽音を立てて飛んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: One of the birds took wing.
MESSAGE.Translation: One of the birds took wing.

MESSAGE.JP: それに釣られるように、周りの鳥も飛び立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: In the wake of it, the other ones took to air as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the wake of it, the other ones took to air as well.

MESSAGE.JP: 一瞬のざわめきの後、辺りはふたたび静寂を取り戻す。
MESSAGE.EN: Silence fell upon the entire courtyard after the momentary bustle.
MESSAGE.Translation: Silence fell upon the entire courtyard after the momentary bustle.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは文字を目で追いながら、微笑んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a smile on Nishizono-san's face as her eyes moved across the page.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a smile on Nishizono-san's face as her eyes moved across the page.

MESSAGE.JP: 何か楽しいことが書いてあるんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe she had reached an interesting part of the story?
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe she had reached an interesting part of the story?

MESSAGE.JP: 穏やかな笑顔を浮かべていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her smile was so gentle.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her smile was so gentle.

MESSAGE.JP: みんなと一緒の時、西園さんは本当に楽しそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed to really enjoy her time with everyone else.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed to really enjoy her time with everyone else.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介や真人、謙吾たちの馬鹿騒ぎに、一緒に声を立てて笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: She'd laugh with all of us when the guys did something stupid.
MESSAGE.Translation: She'd laugh with all of us when the guys did something stupid.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんがちょっかいを出せば、顔を赤くしてうつむき、時に反撃する。
MESSAGE.EN: She'd blush, lower her eyes, and sometimes even strike back when teased by Kurugaya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: She'd blush, lower her eyes, and sometimes even strike back when teased by Kurugaya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんとは、ちょっと子供っぽい言い合いもときにするけれど。
MESSAGE.EN: She and Haruka-san would have their childish spats.
MESSAGE.Translation: She and Haruka-san would have their childish spats.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな時もまた、とても楽しそうになる。
MESSAGE.EN: Even so, Nishizono-san seemed to be having fun.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even so, Nishizono-san seemed to be having fun.

MESSAGE.JP: クドや小毬さんや鈴とも、仲良くやっていると思う。
MESSAGE.EN: She got along well with Kud and Komari-san, too.
MESSAGE.Translation: She got along well with Kud and Komari-san, too.

MESSAGE.JP: だからこそ――。
MESSAGE.EN: Therefore...
MESSAGE.Translation: Therefore...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は気づいてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: I had realized something.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had realized something.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが独りでいる時間、他のみんなといる時には見せない笑顔を浮かべることを。
MESSAGE.EN: I had realized that there was a different kind of smile which she only let show when she was alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had realized that there was a different kind of smile which she only let show when she was alone.

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女の心の奥が映し出されているような、儚い笑みがそこにあることを。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a very fragile one, a smile that felt as though it was a mirror straight into the depths of her soul.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a very fragile one, a smile that felt as though it was a mirror straight into the depths of her soul.

MESSAGE.JP: 白鳥は哀しからずや空の青
MESSAGE.EN: Bird with wings of white, I wonder, is she not sad?
MESSAGE.Translation: Bird with wings of white, I wonder, is she not sad?

MESSAGE.JP: $dうみのあをにも染まず
MESSAGE.EN: $dLeft alone, ne'er touched
MESSAGE.Translation: $dLeft alone, ne'er touched

MESSAGE.JP: $dただよふ
MESSAGE.EN: $dby the blue of yonder sky, or the blue of hither sea.
MESSAGE.Translation: $dby the blue of yonder sky, or the blue of hither sea.

MESSAGE.JP: 不意に…その歌を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: For some reason... I recalled that poem.
MESSAGE.Translation: For some reason... I recalled that poem.

MESSAGE.JP: 時に西園さんが口ずさむ、その短歌を。
MESSAGE.EN: The one which she once recited for me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The one which she once recited for me.

MESSAGE.JP: 今でもまだ、その歌は西園さんにとって『希望』なんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered if it still remained as her ❛hope.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered if it still remained as her ❛hope.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 鳩が一羽、飛び立つのが遅れたのか今ごろになって寄ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: I noticed a lone pigeon walking toward me, which seemed not to have followed the ones that took off earlier.
MESSAGE.Translation: I noticed a lone pigeon walking toward me, which seemed not to have followed the ones that took off earlier.

MESSAGE.JP: 手品で見るような、真っ白な鳩だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was stark white and rather looked like one used for magic shows.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was stark white and rather looked like one used for magic shows.

MESSAGE.JP: 野生の中では白い翼は、嫌でも目立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: The pure white wings would stand out in the wild.
MESSAGE.Translation: The pure white wings would stand out in the wild.

MESSAGE.JP: 敵に狙われやすいから、白い鳩は珍しいと聞いたことがあるけれど…。
MESSAGE.EN: I had heard white pigeons were very scarce because they made such easy targets...
MESSAGE.Translation: I had heard white pigeons were very scarce because they made such easy targets...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は残っていたパンのくずを投げてやった。
MESSAGE.EN: I gave it the rest of the crumbs.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gave it the rest of the crumbs.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねえ、リトルバスターズは楽しい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, do you like the Little Busters?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, do you like the Little Busters?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが本から顔をゆっくりとあげる。
MESSAGE.EN: She slowly lifted up her head from the book.
MESSAGE.Translation: She slowly lifted up her head from the book.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…どうしたんですか、やぶから棒に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...What are you asking that for all of a sudden?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...What are you asking that for all of a sudden?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、なんとなく…ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, just for some reason.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, just for some reason.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…楽しい、ですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Yes, I do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Yes, I do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしは、これまであまり友達らしい友達もいないまま過ごしてきました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I've spent most of my life without anyone I could truly consider a friend.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I've spent most of my life without anyone I could truly consider a friend.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…こんなに大勢の人たちと一緒にわいわいやるのは、初めてです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I never had the chance to share such good times with so many friends before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I never had the chance to share such good times with so many friends before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そう、それは…よかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm really glad to hear that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm really glad to hear that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: その言葉にほっとする。
MESSAGE.EN: Her words relieved me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her words relieved me.

MESSAGE.JP: リトルバスターズに誘ったのは、この僕だから。
MESSAGE.EN: Because it was I who had invited her to the team.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because it was I who had invited her to the team.

MESSAGE.JP: 試合は終わったけれど僕たちの関係は、ずっと続いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though the game was behind us, our friendship would last.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though the game was behind us, our friendship would last.

MESSAGE.JP: そう、僕は願う。
MESSAGE.EN: That's my sincere wish.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's my sincere wish.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい、本当に良かったです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes, I'm glad too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes, I'm glad too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「みなさん、とても賑やかで、楽しくて、眩しくて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝They are all lively, delightful and bright...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝They are all lively, delightful and bright...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「こんなにも騒がしいと、ついついわたしまで一緒に騒いでしまいます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝They have such a joyful air about them that I just can't resist joining in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝They have such a joyful air about them that I just can't resist joining in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それは、初めての経験です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I've never experienced anything like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I've never experienced anything like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's awesome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's awesome.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが微笑むと、僕まで嬉しくなる。
MESSAGE.EN: When I saw her look so happy, I also felt happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I saw her look so happy, I also felt happy.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…それに、直枝さんが傍にいてくれます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...And I'm with you, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...And I'm with you, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: それって、一体…。
MESSAGE.EN: What does that mean...?
MESSAGE.Translation: What does that mean...?

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の胸の音が、知らずに高まる。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt my heart start beating faster.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt my heart start beating faster.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしに、これだけ近づこうとした人は…他にはいません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Nobody else has tried to approach me before...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Nobody else has tried to approach me before...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「本の話も色々とできました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝We talked about books a lot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝We talked about books a lot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…これまでになかったことです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I've never done that before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I've never done that before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y-yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y-yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 喉の奥が渇く。
MESSAGE.EN: The back of my throat felt dry.
MESSAGE.Translation: The back of my throat felt dry.

MESSAGE.JP: 唾を飲み込む。
MESSAGE.EN: I swallowed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I swallowed.

MESSAGE.JP: この言葉の先は、まるで…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's almost as though she might next say...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's almost as though she might next say...

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「でも…それでもやっぱりわたしは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝But... I'm still...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝But... I'm still...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そこで口をつぐむと、西園さんはただ一羽残っていた白い鳩に目を向ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Her words broke off in mid-sentence, as she looked at the white pigeon.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her words broke off in mid-sentence, as she looked at the white pigeon.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、唐突に両手を叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: And then she suddenly slammed her hands together.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then she suddenly slammed her hands together.

MESSAGE.JP: パンッ。
MESSAGE.EN: Clap.
MESSAGE.Translation: Clap.

MESSAGE.JP: 乾いた大きな音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard a dry, loud sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard a dry, loud sound.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 当然、驚いた鳩は慌てて飛び立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: Naturally, the pigeon, taken by surprise, took up into the air.
MESSAGE.Translation: Naturally, the pigeon, taken by surprise, took up into the air.

MESSAGE.JP: 白い鳥が青い空に小さく消えていくのを、僕は唖然として見送った。
MESSAGE.EN: Left speechless by her clap, I watched the white bird fly off into the distant blue.
MESSAGE.Translation: Left speechless by her clap, I watched the white bird fly off into the distant blue.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん、一体どうしたのさ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, what on earth was that about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, what on earth was that about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…なんでもありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...It's nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...It's nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本当になんでもないように、そう呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She murmured nonchalantly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She murmured nonchalantly.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よう、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yo, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yo, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…ん、邪魔だったか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Hmm, did I interrupt you guys?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Hmm, did I interrupt you guys?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 突然現れた恭介は、僕たちの間に流れる微妙な空気を感じ取ったのか、いつもよりちょっと控えめだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke, who had seemingly appeared out of thin air, seemed to have picked up the awkward atmosphere between us, and addressed the question to me in a modest manner.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke, who had seemingly appeared out of thin air, seemed to have picked up the awkward atmosphere between us, and addressed the question to me in a modest manner.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「別にそんなことはないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Not at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Not at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そっか。西園、今日は逃げないでくれよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Good. Nishizono, please don't run away today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Good. Nishizono, please don't run away today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「す、すみません。昨日はお見苦しいところをお見せしました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I-I'm really sorry about yesterday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I-I'm really sorry about yesterday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なに、理樹が必死なところが見られたから、楽しかったぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Never mind. It was fun watching Riki chase you with all his might.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Never mind. It was fun watching Riki chase you with all his might.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「と、ところで恭介、昨日はなんの用だったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝B-by the way, what is it you wanted to tell us?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝B-by the way, what is it you wanted to tell us?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ああ、そのことで今日も来たんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Ah, that's what I'm here to speak about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Ah, that's what I'm here to speak about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「実はな、こんな企画があるんだが、参加してみないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Actually, there is this contest. Why don't we join it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Actually, there is this contest. Why don't we join it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう言って、恭介が一枚の紙を差し出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Saying thus, he handed me a piece of paper.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saying thus, he handed me a piece of paper.

MESSAGE.JP: 『輝け!!　第１０回短歌コンクール～演歌じゃないよ、短歌だよ』
MESSAGE.EN: [Win Glory!! The 10th Annual Tanka Contest ～ It's Tanka, Not Enka!]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Win Glory!! The 10th Annual Tanka Contest ～ It's Tanka, Not Enka!]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なに、これ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What is this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What is this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一瞬、西園さんが$K45着物$K0を着て小節をきかせている姿を思い浮かべてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: For an instant, I imagined Nishizono-san in $K45kimono$K0 singing an enka song with a strong vibrato.
MESSAGE.Translation: For an instant, I imagined Nishizono-san in $K45kimono$K0 singing an enka song with a strong vibrato.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「企画名はどうかと思うが、中身はまともっぽいぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The event may have a strange name, but the content itself looks proper.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The event may have a strange name, but the content itself looks proper.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「我らがリトルバスターズは、完全に体育会系だからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Recently, the Little Busters haven't done much but play baseball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Recently, the Little Busters haven't done much but play baseball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ここはひとつ、文武両道を目指すべきではないか、と思ったわけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So I've been thinking this is a good chance to add something literary to our repertoire.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So I've been thinking this is a good chance to add something literary to our repertoire.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「となれば、ここで頼るのは西園しかいないからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And for that, Nishizono is the only one we can rely on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And for that, Nishizono is the only one we can rely on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は渡された紙に目を通す。
MESSAGE.EN: I went through the flyer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went through the flyer.

MESSAGE.JP: 文芸部のアピール企画らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Apparently it was advertising an event by the literature club.
MESSAGE.Translation: Apparently it was advertising an event by the literature club.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これ、しめ切りが今度の土曜日じゃない。あと四日しかないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We have to register for an entry by Saturday. Just four days left.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We have to register for an entry by Saturday. Just four days left.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…仕方ないだろう。栞代わりに挟んでおいたら、忘れてたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Don't blame me. I forgot about it because I was using the flier as a bookmark.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Don't blame me. I forgot about it because I was using the flier as a bookmark.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …いい加減だなあ。
MESSAGE.EN: He was clearly brimming with enthusiasm...
MESSAGE.Translation: He was clearly brimming with enthusiasm...

MESSAGE.JP: そもそも、恭介に見せられるまで、こんな企画があることも知らなかったし。
MESSAGE.EN: To begin with, I hadn't even known such a thing was going to be taking place until his announcement.
MESSAGE.Translation: To begin with, I hadn't even known such a thing was going to be taking place until his announcement.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは僕の渡した紙を熱心に読んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san was attentively examining the flyer.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san was attentively examining the flyer.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうする、西園さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What do you think, Nishizono-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What do you think, Nishizono-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 応募作が一作、なんてことになったりしないかな。
MESSAGE.EN: Wouldn't it be sad if they only got one entry...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Wouldn't it be sad if they only got one entry...?

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さんは、どう思いますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝What do YOU think, Naoe-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝What do YOU think, Naoe-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 逆に僕に問いかける。
MESSAGE.EN: She returned the question.
MESSAGE.Translation: She returned the question.

MESSAGE.JP: それでも。
MESSAGE.EN: Nevertheless.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nevertheless.

MESSAGE.JP: どう思うか、と訊かれれば、答えはひとつだ。
MESSAGE.EN: From the beginning, there was only one choice.
MESSAGE.Translation: From the beginning, there was only one choice.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いいんじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think it's gonna be fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think it's gonna be fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さんがどんな作品を出すのか、見てみたいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Actually, I'm curious as to what kind of poem you'll write.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Actually, I'm curious as to what kind of poem you'll write.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 以前、西園さんは、読んでいる本を知りたいと思うことは、『わたし』を知りたいと思うことだ、と言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She had once said to me that wanting to know about the books she read was the same as wanting to know about ❝herself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She had once said to me that wanting to know about the books she read was the same as wanting to know about ❝herself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ならば、その人の作品を読みたいと思うことは、やはり『その人』を知りたいと思うことかも知れない。
MESSAGE.EN: If it was the case, wanting to know about the poems a particular person made would also tell us about ❝them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: If it was the case, wanting to know about the poems a particular person made would also tell us about ❝them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そう、ですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝All... right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝All... right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…分かりました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I will give it a shot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I will give it a shot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん…手伝っていただけますか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san... could you please give me a hand?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san... could you please give me a hand?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もちろんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure, why not?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure, why not?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「頑張ろうね、西園さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's do our best, Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's do our best, Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「頼むぜ、西園。なんたって、リトルバスターズ代表なんだからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm counting on you, Nishizono. You'll represent the Little Busters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm counting on you, Nishizono. You'll represent the Little Busters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺たちが単なる馬鹿じゃないとこを見せてやるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We'll make the world see we're not just a bunch of idiots.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We'll make the world see we're not just a bunch of idiots.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…それは既に手遅れかと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I think it's too late for that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I think it's too late for that.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…ところで、その『俺たち』には、わたしも含まれているんでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...By the way, does the ❛we❜ include me, as well?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...By the way, does the ❛we❜ include me, as well?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「もちろん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Of course.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Of course.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…やっぱり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I knew it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I knew it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「それにしても、おまえも飽きねーな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You never get tired of it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You never get tired of it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 昼は途中で恭介が来たりして、最後まで読み切れなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I hadn't been able to finish reading the book at lunch time, due to Kyousuke's announcement.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hadn't been able to finish reading the book at lunch time, due to Kyousuke's announcement.

MESSAGE.JP: 今晩中には読み終えられるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to finish reading it that night.
