MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「鬼畜です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You're a demon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You're a demon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…なんだか寒気がぶり返してきました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I feel like I'm starting to relapse.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I feel like I'm starting to relapse.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その発言のとおり、身を震わす。
MESSAGE.EN: At those reproachful words, she really seemed to shiver.
MESSAGE.Translation: At those reproachful words, she really seemed to shiver.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、あのね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, listen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, listen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなつもりじゃなくて…ただ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's not what I meant... I just...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's not what I meant... I just...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「冗談です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It was a joke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It was a joke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝O-oh yeah?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝O-oh yeah?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なら、いいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, in that case...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, in that case...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 相変わらずの西園さんに、ほっとするのも束の間。
MESSAGE.EN: Though our typical banter had put me at ease,
MESSAGE.Translation: Though our typical banter had put me at ease,

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女は続けた。
MESSAGE.EN: she continued by asking a question.
MESSAGE.Translation: she continued by asking a question.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「『わたし』を見た人がいるのですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Somebody saw ❛me,❜ didn't they?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Somebody saw ❛me,❜ didn't they?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 違う、とは言えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I could not allow myself to deny it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could not allow myself to deny it.

MESSAGE.JP: 探りを入れようとしたのは、事実だから。
MESSAGE.EN: Because that was one of the reasons for this visit.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because that was one of the reasons for this visit.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの口から『実は抜け出しちゃいました』と聞くことができたなら、僕はその方がどれだけ安心できたことだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt I would have actually been more relieved if she had confessed that she had snuck out to visit the town.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt I would have actually been more relieved if she had confessed that she had snuck out to visit the town.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしは…ずっと寝てました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I've been... in bed all along.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I've been... in bed all along.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「起きれるようになったのは、夕方になってからです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It wasn't until evening that I felt well enough to leave bed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It wasn't until evening that I felt well enough to leave bed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…きっと見間違いでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...They must have gotten the wrong person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...They must have gotten the wrong person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そう、だよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝R-right, that must be the case.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝R-right, that must be the case.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「その通りです。ですから…直枝さんが気にすることはありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It is. So... don't pay it any mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It is. So... don't pay it any mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それから、もう一度身を震わせた。
MESSAGE.EN: Then she trembled yet again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then she trembled yet again.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「寒いの？　…だったら、そろそろ部屋に戻った方が」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you cold? ...If so, you'd better get back to your room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you cold? ...If so, you'd better get back to your room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 初夏の夕暮れは、まだ日も暖かい。
MESSAGE.EN: It was still warm at dusk in the early summer.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was still warm at dusk in the early summer.

MESSAGE.JP: 決して、肌寒いような気温じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: It was highly unlikely that people normally felt chilly at this temperature.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was highly unlikely that people normally felt chilly at this temperature.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの身を震わすのは、風邪のせいだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Could I really attribute her shudder to a cold?
MESSAGE.Translation: Could I really attribute her shudder to a cold?

MESSAGE.JP: それとも…。
MESSAGE.EN: Or...
MESSAGE.Translation: Or...

MESSAGE.JP: このまま、部屋に帰してしまっていいんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered if I should really let her return to her room...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered if I should really let her return to her room...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「にし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishi...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishi...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん、ひとつ、お願いがあります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, I have a favor to ask of you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, I have a favor to ask of you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 当てもなく口を開こうとした僕を遮り、微笑みかける。
MESSAGE.EN: Cutting off my fumbling words, she addressed me with a smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: Cutting off my fumbling words, she addressed me with a smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なにかな？　僕に出来ることだったら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What is it? I'll do anything I possibly can.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What is it? I'll do anything I possibly can.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「次の日曜日に、ちょっとお付き合いいただきたいのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'd like you to go out with me next Sunday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'd like you to go out with me next Sunday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: それは思いもよらない誘いだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That sudden invitation caught me off guard.
MESSAGE.Translation: That sudden invitation caught me off guard.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「暇はありますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Are you free?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Are you free?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「特に予定はないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't have anything planned...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't have anything planned...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…僕と？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...But are you sure you want to go with me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...But are you sure you want to go with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あらかじめお断りしておきますけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Let me make something clear first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Let me make something clear first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「決して、デートでも逢い引きでもありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It will definitely not be anything like a date or a rendezvous.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It will definitely not be anything like a date or a rendezvous.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…そこを、勘違いしないでください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Please don't get the wrong idea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Please don't get the wrong idea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「毛の先ほども、そんなつもりではありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I have no such intention. I swear to God.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I have no such intention. I swear to God.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんなきっぱりと言わなくても…。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't have to hit me over the head with it like that...
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't have to hit me over the head with it like that...

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ただ、ご一緒してほしい所があるんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'd merely like you to accompany me to a certain place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'd merely like you to accompany me to a certain place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「朝、迎えに来てもらえますか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Could you pick me up in the morning?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Could you pick me up in the morning?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、わかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure, I'll do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure, I'll do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「きっと、ですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Please... don't forget.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Please... don't forget.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 念を押すような強い口調に、戸惑いを覚えながらも僕は嬉しかった。
MESSAGE.EN: In spite of being surprised by the strength of her tone of voice, I was very happy with her offer.
MESSAGE.Translation: In spite of being surprised by the strength of her tone of voice, I was very happy with her offer.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんのことが気に掛かり、僕はいつもより早めに部屋を出た。
MESSAGE.EN: My concern over Nishizono-san led me to head to the classroom earlier than usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: My concern over Nishizono-san led me to head to the classroom earlier than usual.

MESSAGE.JP: 人の少ない教室でしばらく待っていると、まだ顔色が少し悪いようには見えたけれど西園さんが登校してきた。
MESSAGE.EN: After a short wait in the almost empty classroom, Nishizono-san, who still looked a little bit pale, came in.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a short wait in the almost empty classroom, Nishizono-san, who still looked a little bit pale, came in.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「おはようございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Good morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Good morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 消え入りそうな小さな声で、答えた。
MESSAGE.EN: She returned my greeting in a very weak voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: She returned my greeting in a very weak voice.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まだ、体調悪いの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Still feeling ill?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Still feeling ill?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そういうわけではありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No, I'm not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No, I'm not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ご心配なく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Please don't worry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Please don't worry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ならいいけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そこで教室に入ってきた男子が僕の傍を通る。
MESSAGE.EN: A male classmate, who had just entered, passed me by.
MESSAGE.Translation: A male classmate, who had just entered, passed me by.

MESSAGE.JP: `男子@「おはよう。直枝」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student@❝Morning, Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student@❝Morning, Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 彼は僕と話していた西園さんには目もくれず、自分の席に向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: And he walked straight to his desk without even looking at Nishizono-san, who was standing right beside my desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: And he walked straight to his desk without even looking at Nishizono-san, who was standing right beside my desk.

MESSAGE.JP: まるで、最初から彼女がそこにいないように。
MESSAGE.EN: As if she wasn't actually there.
MESSAGE.Translation: As if she wasn't actually there.

MESSAGE.JP: あえて無視をした、というわけでさえない。
MESSAGE.EN: I doubted that he had ignored her deliberately.
MESSAGE.Translation: I doubted that he had ignored her deliberately.

MESSAGE.JP: ひどく自然な態度だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Because his behavior looked entirely natural.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because his behavior looked entirely natural.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「どうかしましたか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝What's the matter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝What's the matter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ううん、何でもないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nothing. Never mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nothing. Never mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「明日、楽しみだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm looking forward to going out with you tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm looking forward to going out with you tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の言葉に、西園さんはかすかに頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded lightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded lightly.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「よう、理樹。今朝は早かったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yo, Riki. You got up early this morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yo, Riki. You got up early this morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、まあね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, sort of.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, sort of.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「西園、もう大丈夫か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Nishizono, you okay now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Nishizono, you okay now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そっか、そいつはよかったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Awesome. Good for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Awesome. Good for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「やっぱ、もっと筋肉つけなきゃダメだぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You really should grow more muscle on your bones.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You really should grow more muscle on your bones.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの顔を見て、いつもみたいに真人が笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: He laughed, looking at Nishizono-san's face in his usual relaxed manner.
MESSAGE.Translation: He laughed, looking at Nishizono-san's face in his usual relaxed manner.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ま、真人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ma-Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ma-Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「な、なんだよ。気持ち悪い声出すなよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Wha-what's wrong with you? You sound gross.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Wha-what's wrong with you? You sound gross.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オレ、なんか変なこと言ったか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Did I say something odd?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Did I say something odd?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ううん、ちょっと嬉しかったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, you just made my day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, you just made my day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「変な理樹だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You're being weird today, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You're being weird today, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…井ノ原さんはいつも変です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Inohara-san is weird all the time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Inohara-san is weird all the time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ぐはっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Guha!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Guha!❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんかダメージを受けていた。
MESSAGE.EN: He seemed to take a critical hit.
MESSAGE.Translation: He seemed to take a critical hit.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ははは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それから可笑しくなって、笑ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: And then I burst into laughter.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then I burst into laughter.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん、行きましょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ、どこへ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, where to?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, where to?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…一昨日のことを忘れたんですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Did you forget about it already?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Did you forget about it already?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「短歌コンクール、です。今日がしめ切りですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's about the tanka contest. Today's the deadline.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's about the tanka contest. Today's the deadline.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そう言えば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A, ah, that's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A, ah, that's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの欠席で、すっかり忘れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I completely forgot about it due to her absence yesterday.
MESSAGE.Translation: I completely forgot about it due to her absence yesterday.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、この前は結局作れなかったんじゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But we haven't made any, have we...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But we haven't made any, have we...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…あの河原で話したことを覚えていますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Do you remember the conversation we had at the riverside?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Do you remember the conversation we had at the riverside?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんだろう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Which conversation exactly?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Which conversation exactly?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 色々と話したから、西園さんがどのことを言っているのか思い浮かばない。
MESSAGE.EN: We had talked about many different things, so I wasn't sure what exactly she was referring to.
MESSAGE.Translation: We had talked about many different things, so I wasn't sure what exactly she was referring to.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「百人一首には、恋の歌がたくさん収められているという話です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝About the Hyakunin Isshu containing a number of love-related poems.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝About the Hyakunin Isshu containing a number of love-related poems.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、覚えているよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I remember it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I remember it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「たとえば崇徳院は、流れる川に自分の気持ちを重ねて歌を歌いました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Sutokuin, for example, wrote one relating his feelings to the river current.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Sutokuin, for example, wrote one relating his feelings to the river current.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「同じ景色を見ても、ただの川にしか思わない人もいれば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Even if different people saw the same thing, to some it might be just a river...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Even if different people saw the same thing, to some it might be just a river...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そこに、離ればなれになってしまった恋人を思い浮かべる人もいるのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝While to others it may remind them of their separation from their loved ones.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝While to others it may remind them of their separation from their loved ones.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「その人の気持ち、記憶、経験、そういったものによって、見える世界は違うんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The way we define the world varies depending on one's feelings, memories, and experiences.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The way we define the world varies depending on one's feelings, memories, and experiences.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「確かに、そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I think so, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I think so, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「同じ『自分』でも、時と場合によって感じ方は全然違うものね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even the same person can see the same thing differently, depending on the time and circumstances.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even the same person can see the same thing differently, depending on the time and circumstances.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 楽しい時には、真人の馬鹿な台詞も腹を抱えるほどに可笑しいし、逆に落ちこんでいる時は、聞きたくもないと思うことさえある。
MESSAGE.EN: When I am happy, I can easily laugh out loud at Masato's absurd jokes. On the other hand, when I am depressed, I do not always even want to hear his voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I am happy, I can easily laugh out loud at Masato's absurd jokes. On the other hand, when I am depressed, I do not always even want to hear his voice.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そうですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Definitely.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Definitely.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「だから…わたしと直枝さんが見ている世界は違います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And that's why... the world I see differs from the one you do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And that's why... the world I see differs from the one you do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それが、当たり前なんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's a given.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's a given.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の気持ちを見透かされ、そして否定をされているのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Did she see through my feelings and was trying to deny them?
MESSAGE.Translation: Did she see through my feelings and was trying to deny them?

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「すみません、話が逸れました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Sorry, I digressed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Sorry, I digressed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…そんなことを言うつもりではなかったんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I did not mean to say that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I did not mean to say that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「その、つまり、何を言おうとしたかといいますと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Well, you know, what I'm trying to say is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Well, you know, what I'm trying to say is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんだか少し混乱しているみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed somewhat confused herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed somewhat confused herself.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「要するに…あの時は、隣に直枝さんがいた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Thing is... you were right next to me at that time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Thing is... you were right next to me at that time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「おそらく、わたしの見ている世界はあの瞬間、確かにいつもと違っていました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I dare say that the world I was seeing back then was different from usual.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I dare say that the world I was seeing back then was different from usual.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「普段ならば意味を見出さないものに、意味を見出した」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I found meaning in something that I usually don't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I found meaning in something that I usually don't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…だから、この歌は、直枝さんと一緒に作ったものです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Hence, this poem is our collaborative work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Hence, this poem is our collaborative work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり、よくわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I still did not see her point.
MESSAGE.Translation: I still did not see her point.

MESSAGE.JP: その言葉の意味を考えてみようとするよりも早く、西園さんが歩いていってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned away before I could decipher what she had meant.
MESSAGE.Translation: She turned away before I could decipher what she had meant.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「と、ともかく、出しに行きましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝A-anyway, let's go and turn it in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝A-anyway, let's go and turn it in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: チラシに書かれていた受付の教室の前まで行くと、恭介が先にいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke was waiting for us outside of the room where the works were to be handed in.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke was waiting for us outside of the room where the works were to be handed in.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よう、できたか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, you guys finished?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, you guys finished?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「らしいんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Apparently...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Apparently...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの方をちらりと見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I cast a glance at Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I cast a glance at Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕もまだ詳しく聞いていないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I still don't know any details, either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I still don't know any details, either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どうなんだ、西園？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's the situation, Nishizono?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's the situation, Nishizono?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい、こちらにあります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I have it right here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I have it right here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが手にしているのは、一枚の封筒だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was holding an envelope in her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was holding an envelope in her hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どんなのを作ったの？　見せてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's it like? Let me check it out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's it like? Let me check it out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「………お断りします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........I politely refuse.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........I politely refuse.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…冷静になって思い返すと、かなり恥ずかしい気がしてきました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...The more I step back and think about it, the more embarrassed I become.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...The more I step back and think about it, the more embarrassed I become.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「これが…人の目に触れるんですよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝To think that this... will be seen by other people.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝To think that this... will be seen by other people.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、そうだろうな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, naturally.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, naturally.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「やはり…帰りましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I guess... we should leave.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I guess... we should leave.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ここまで来て、それはないだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Come on, you didn't get this far to do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Come on, you didn't get this far to do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえたちなら、きっと良いのができたんじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm sure you two did a great job.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm sure you two did a great job.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕たち？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Us two?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Us two?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうだ、おまえ『たち』だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Right, you ❛two.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Right, you ❛two.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「せっかく、他の奴らが気を利かせて、一昨日は二人だけにしてやったんだからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's why we went out of our way to leave you guys alone two days back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's why we went out of our way to leave you guys alone two days back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ははは、まあ、それはさておき」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hahaha, well, that's not that important.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hahaha, well, that's not that important.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「西園、自信を持てとは言わないが。出さないと後悔するかも知れないぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Nishizono, I won't tell you to be more confident, but I'd say you may regret it if you quit here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Nishizono, I won't tell you to be more confident, but I'd say you may regret it if you quit here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…恭介さん、あなたは何かご存知なのですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Kyousuke-san, do you somehow know what this is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Kyousuke-san, do you somehow know what this is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いやあ、何のことかさっぱりだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Nah, I have no idea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Nah, I have no idea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…ですよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...True. You couldn't possibly have.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...True. You couldn't possibly have.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「もしも、俺の発言に何か感じることがあるのだとすれば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝If you felt something from what I said,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝If you felt something from what I said,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「それは西園、おまえの心の中にあることの裏返しだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝it means that in your heart you already know you would regret it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝it means that in your heart you already know you would regret it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「恭介さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Kyousuke-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Kyousuke-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「一体、どうしたのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's going on here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's going on here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いや、俺にもさっぱりだ。西園に訊いてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I have no idea. Ask her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I have no idea. Ask her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「さ、さあ…出してきましょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝N-now then... let's go and hand it in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝N-now then... let's go and hand it in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「中にいる方に渡せば良いのでしょうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm supposed to hand this over to the people inside the room, aren't I?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm supposed to hand this over to the people inside the room, aren't I?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう言って、慌てて教室に入っていってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Saying so, she hurried into the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saying so, she hurried into the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「発表は、来週の水曜日か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The results will be announced next Wednesday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The results will be announced next Wednesday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さんの作品が、どんなのか見に行かなくちゃね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm gonna have to go check out your work, Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm gonna have to go check out your work, Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「期待されると、やはり恥ずかしいのですが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm embarrassed that you expect so much of me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm embarrassed that you expect so much of me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それほど、期待するものではないと思います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I don't think it's something so worth looking forward to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I don't think it's something so worth looking forward to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ううん、やっぱり興味があるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I do. I'm very interested in it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I do. I'm very interested in it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「楽しみ、だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I just can't wait.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I just can't wait.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「………直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「どうか、結果を見届けてくださいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Please check the results of the contest for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Please check the results of the contest for me.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんな話をしているうちに、すぐに寮の前まで着いてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: In the course of that conversation, we had reached the front of the girls' dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the course of that conversation, we had reached the front of the girls' dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん、ではまた明日」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, I'll see you tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, I'll see you tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。朝、迎えに行くよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I'm picking you up tomorrow morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I'm picking you up tomorrow morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 約束どおり、僕は女子寮に向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: I headed to the dorm as I'd promised.
MESSAGE.Translation: I headed to the dorm as I'd promised.

MESSAGE.JP: すでに西園さんが待っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was already there.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was already there.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「おはようございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Good morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Good morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「おはよう、ございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Good morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Good morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん…おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, yeah.... morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, yeah.... morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「何をぼお、としてるんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You look out of it. What happened?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You look out of it. What happened?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、ごめん。なんでもないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, sorry. Never mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, sorry. Never mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの私服にみとれていた、なんて口に出せない。
MESSAGE.EN: It was too embarrassing to tell her that I had been captivated by the sight of her in her casual clothes.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was too embarrassing to tell her that I had been captivated by the sight of her in her casual clothes.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今日は制服じゃないんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're not wearing your uniform today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're not wearing your uniform today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「お休みですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Because it's a holiday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Because it's a holiday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何を当たり前な、という感じだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She answered as if questioning what I had made such a pointless statement for.
MESSAGE.Translation: She answered as if questioning what I had made such a pointless statement for.

MESSAGE.JP: 先日、部屋を訪ねた時に制服に着替えたのは学校のあった日だったからなのか。
MESSAGE.EN: That explained why she had gone to the trouble of changing her clothes when I had visited her the other day: it had been a school day.
MESSAGE.Translation: That explained why she had gone to the trouble of changing her clothes when I had visited her the other day: it had been a school day.

MESSAGE.JP: …律儀だなあ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...How very dutiful.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...How very dutiful.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、早速出かけようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right, let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right, let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…せっかく朝早く来ていただいたのですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...You came here this early in the morning for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...You came here this early in the morning for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「まずはお茶など、いかがですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝So why don't we have tea or something for starters?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝So why don't we have tea or something for starters?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、いいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, is that all right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, is that all right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい。汚いところですけど、どうぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Sure. I hope my messy room will not offend you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Sure. I hope my messy room will not offend you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女子寮で、しかも部屋といわれると、ちょっと迷う。でも、せっかく誘ってくれたんだし。
MESSAGE.EN: Although I was slightly hesitant going into the girls' dorm, and even to a girl's room itself, I did not want to decline her kind offer.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although I was slightly hesitant going into the girls' dorm, and even to a girl's room itself, I did not want to decline her kind offer.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は部屋に案内された。
MESSAGE.EN: She led me to her room.
MESSAGE.Translation: She led me to her room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…きれいじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...It's so clean.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...It's so clean.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 汚いところ、がいかに謙遜であるかが分かる。
MESSAGE.EN: I had already gathered how modest she was from how she'd described her room as messy beforehand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had already gathered how modest she was from how she'd described her room as messy beforehand.

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに、入り口付近には本棚が置かれていて、本が詰め込まれているのは壮観だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Indeed there were piles of books around the door, which made quite a sight.
MESSAGE.Translation: Indeed there were piles of books around the door, which made quite a sight.

MESSAGE.JP: 一段ずつ、ぎっしりと本が整頓して並べられている。
MESSAGE.EN: However, each pile was organized compactly and cleanly.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, each pile was organized compactly and cleanly.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、それは西園さんの部屋ならば想定の範囲内。
MESSAGE.EN: In fact, I had been expecting this much because I knew she was an extensive reader.
MESSAGE.Translation: In fact, I had been expecting this much because I knew she was an extensive reader.

MESSAGE.JP: 全体的にはこざっぱりと片付いた部屋だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Overall, her room looked simple and tidy.
MESSAGE.Translation: Overall, her room looked simple and tidy.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕ら男子寮の部屋とは比べ物にならない。
MESSAGE.EN: Our room couldn't hold a candle to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our room couldn't hold a candle to it.

MESSAGE.JP: 同じ人類という種族に属しながら、こうも違うものなのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite the fact that she and I were both homo sapiens, there seemed to be a vast gulf between us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite the fact that she and I were both homo sapiens, there seemed to be a vast gulf between us.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「お世辞なら、結構です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You can spare the flattery.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You can spare the flattery.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、ほんとに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I mean it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I mean it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いえいえ。
MESSAGE.EN: No, no.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, no.

MESSAGE.JP: そんなことないよ。
MESSAGE.EN: Yes, yes, yes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yes, yes, yes.

MESSAGE.JP: いえいえいえ。
MESSAGE.EN: No, no, no, no.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, no, no, no.

MESSAGE.JP: いやいやいやいやいや。
MESSAGE.EN: Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes.

MESSAGE.JP: と、しばらく変なやりとりが続いた後、僕は腰を落ち着ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a seat after the comical dialogue.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a seat after the comical dialogue.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クドは今日はどうしてるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's Kud doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's Kud doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それが、今日は直枝さんが朝にみえます、と言ったら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Well, I told her you were going to come here today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Well, I told her you were going to come here today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「『分かりました、私に任せてください』と言われたまま」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And she said ❛I got it, leave everything to me.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And she said ❛I got it, leave everything to me.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「早起きしてどこかに行ってしまわれたのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And then she woke up early and left.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And then she woke up early and left.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…やな気の遣われ方だなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...She didn't have to be so self conscious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...She didn't have to be so self conscious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「お茶をいれてきますね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'll go and make tea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'll go and make tea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: She stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ちょっと待って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Hold on a second.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Hold on a second.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 部屋を出ようとした西園さんを制して、僕はドアを開ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I motioned her back and opened the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: I motioned her back and opened the door.

MESSAGE.JP: ごちん。
MESSAGE.EN: *Bump*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bump*.

MESSAGE.JP: 外開きのドアは、そのまま廊下にいる人物にぶつかる。
MESSAGE.EN: The door hit someone in the hallway as it swung outward.
MESSAGE.Translation: The door hit someone in the hallway as it swung outward.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「いたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ouch!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ouch!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 頭を押さえて、小動物っぽいのがうずくまっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: What looked like a small animal was hunched over, holding its head with its hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: What looked like a small animal was hunched over, holding its head with its hands.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クド、何をしているのかな…」

MESSAGE.JP: タンスの奥が四次元にでも繋がっているのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe her closet was connected to an alternate dimension or something?
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe her closet was connected to an alternate dimension or something?

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「$K22為せば成る、為さねば成らぬ何ごとも$K0」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝$K22Everything is impossible until you try$K0.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝$K22Everything is impossible until you try$K0.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「上杉鷹山は言いました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Those are the words of Uesugi Youzan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Those are the words of Uesugi Youzan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…誰、それ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Who... is that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Who... is that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ちなみに『成せば』は誤字で、『為せば』が正しいのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝By the way, the correct way to write it in English is ❛impossible,❜ not ❛inpossible.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝By the way, the correct way to write it in English is ❛impossible,❜ not ❛inpossible.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、口で言われても区別つかないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, I can't really tell the difference when you say it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, I can't really tell the difference when you say it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 結局、ごまかされた気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt like she had just cleverly avoided explaining the mystery space in her closet.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt like she had just cleverly avoided explaining the mystery space in her closet.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだ。この本、今度貸してくれない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Almost forgot. Can you lend me this one later?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Almost forgot. Can you lend me this one later?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 棚に並んでいる本を一冊、手に取る。
MESSAGE.EN: I drew a book out of the shelf.
MESSAGE.Translation: I drew a book out of the shelf.

MESSAGE.JP: さっき、タイトルに興味を持った本だ。
MESSAGE.EN: That was the one which had interested me before the flood of books.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was the one which had interested me before the flood of books.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…今度、ですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Later?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Later?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんはためらう口ぶりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She sounded hesitant.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sounded hesitant.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まだ読んでない本だった？　それなら後でもいいけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You haven't finished it yet? If so, I can wait.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You haven't finished it yet? If so, I can wait.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いえ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そうですね。では、今お貸しします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝All right. I'll lend it to you right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝All right. I'll lend it to you right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ、荷物になるから戻ってからでいいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, can't you do that after we go out?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, can't you do that after we go out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「忘れるといけませんから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝What if we both forget about it after that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝What if we both forget about it after that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 半ば強引に僕に押しつけてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She thrust the book to my hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: She thrust the book to my hands.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Ah, that's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Ah, that's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「これもぜひ、持って行ってください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Please take this one, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Please take this one, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手渡されたのは、いつか彼女がケヤキの下で読んでいた、その本だ。
MESSAGE.EN: She handed me the book which she had been reading under the zelkova tree before.
MESSAGE.Translation: She handed me the book which she had been reading under the zelkova tree before.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、これは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But this is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But this is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: わたし自身とも思えるんです。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛I think this book is myself.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛I think this book is myself.❜

MESSAGE.JP: そうとまで言っていた本を、西園さんが僕に渡そうとする。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san was trying to give me that book which was so crucially important to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san was trying to give me that book which was so crucially important to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしが、直枝さんに持っていてほしいんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I would like you to keep it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I would like you to keep it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 躊躇していると、強い口調で迫る。
MESSAGE.EN: She insisted firmly as I hesitated to take it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She insisted firmly as I hesitated to take it.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…最初のページから、目を通してください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Please start reading from the very first page.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Please start reading from the very first page.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう言われてみれば、僕はこの本をしっかりと読んだことはない。
MESSAGE.EN: Come to think of it, I had not read this book seriously before.
MESSAGE.Translation: Come to think of it, I had not read this book seriously before.

MESSAGE.JP: 以前に教室で見つけた時に、ぱらぱらと捲ったくらいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had just skimmed over some pages of it when I had found it in the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had just skimmed over some pages of it when I had found it in the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: それでも、西園さんがいかに本を大切にしているかはよくわかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Nevertheless, I had learned back then how much she treasures it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nevertheless, I had learned back then how much she treasures it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、借りるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, then I'll take it as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, then I'll take it as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 持ってきた鞄に、その二冊の本を入れる。
MESSAGE.EN: I put both books into the bag I had with me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put both books into the bag I had with me.

MESSAGE.JP: 休日の時にしか使わない大き目の鞄には、財布しか入れてないけど、それが役に立ったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Good thing I only had my wallet in it, as the books took up most of the space inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: Good thing I only had my wallet in it, as the books took up most of the space inside.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい、お願いします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: どこか縋るような西園さんの瞳…ちょうど、あの放課後に僕に助けを求めたのと同じ色をしている。
MESSAGE.EN: Her eyes, which seemed to be imploring me for support, had the same color on them as when she had asked me to help her find her lost book in the classroom before.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her eyes, which seemed to be imploring me for support, had the same color on them as when she had asked me to help her find her lost book in the classroom before.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん…何か、あったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san... Is there something bothering you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san... Is there something bothering you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もし僕でよければ、力になるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe I can help you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe I can help you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は最近のクラスの様子を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I recalled how our class had behaved recently.
MESSAGE.Translation: I recalled how our class had behaved recently.

MESSAGE.JP: もともと西園さんと親しくなかった人たちは、以前にもまして西園さんに興味を持っていないようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Those who weren't very close to her appeared to be showing, if possible, even less interest in her than ever.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those who weren't very close to her appeared to be showing, if possible, even less interest in her than ever.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕だって、クラスの全員と親しいわけじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course, even I didn't know every one of my classmates well.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course, even I didn't know every one of my classmates well.

MESSAGE.JP: 何日間も口をきかない人だって、何人もいる。
MESSAGE.EN: I hadn't even talked to a number of them for several days.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hadn't even talked to a number of them for several days.

MESSAGE.JP: だから、何も違わないはずなんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Hence, there shouldn't be any difference between me and her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hence, there shouldn't be any difference between me and her.

MESSAGE.JP: …それでも、何かが違ってきているように思えた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But I felt there was something more.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But I felt there was something more.

MESSAGE.JP: まるで、西園さんがそこにいないみたいに振る舞う彼ら。
MESSAGE.EN: They had acted as if she did not exist.
MESSAGE.Translation: They had acted as if she did not exist.

MESSAGE.JP: 無視、じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: They didn't seem to be ❛ignoring❜ her.
MESSAGE.Translation: They didn't seem to be ❛ignoring❜ her.

MESSAGE.JP: 貧弱な語彙から、あえて探し出せば。
MESSAGE.EN: A more specific adjective in my limited vocabulary to describe how they treated her would be...
MESSAGE.Translation: A more specific adjective in my limited vocabulary to describe how they treated her would be...

MESSAGE.JP: 無機、だろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...as inorganic.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...as inorganic.

MESSAGE.JP: 傍から見ているだけの僕が感じるくらいだから。
MESSAGE.EN: I had felt it despite not being subject to it myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had felt it despite not being subject to it myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 当然、西園さんはもっと強く感じているに違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: Naturally she must have felt it much more acutely.
MESSAGE.Translation: Naturally she must have felt it much more acutely.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いえ、何もないですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No, I'm fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No, I'm fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが笑顔を見せる。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave me a smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave me a smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「今日はとことん、付き合っていただきますよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You're going to be devoting the whole day to me today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You're going to be devoting the whole day to me today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どこに連れて行かれるのか、ちょっと怖いけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm kinda worried where you are going to take me, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm kinda worried where you are going to take me, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…失礼です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...How rude.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...How rude.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「では、そろそろ行きましょうか。直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝All right, we should be off now, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝All right, we should be off now, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 部屋を出る前、僕は冷たくなったお茶を口に含んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I gulped down my tea, which had already turned tepid, before we left the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gulped down my tea, which had already turned tepid, before we left the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 日本茶の苦みばかりが、舌に残った。
MESSAGE.EN: The bitter aftertaste of the green tea lingered in my mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: The bitter aftertaste of the green tea lingered in my mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん、直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 外に出た西園さんは、先ほど感じた憂いが嘘のように何だか嬉しそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Once we got outside, she looked so happy as though the gloom she had showed earlier was all a lie.
MESSAGE.Translation: Once we got outside, she looked so happy as though the gloom she had showed earlier was all a lie.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕を先導するようにして、街を歩く。
MESSAGE.EN: She led me down the street.
MESSAGE.Translation: She led me down the street.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「大きいぬいぐるみです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Look at that huge stuffed animal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Look at that huge stuffed animal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ショーウィンドウを覗き込んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: She was staring into a store's window.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was staring into a store's window.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どれが？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let me see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let me see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 少し遅れて、僕は西園さんの横に立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: I moved to her side.
MESSAGE.Translation: I moved to her side.

MESSAGE.JP: 間近で微笑む西園さんの笑顔が、何だか新鮮だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a new experience for me, seeing her smiling face so close to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a new experience for me, seeing her smiling face so close to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが見つめる、そのぬいぐるみは確かに大きかった。
MESSAGE.EN: The stuffed animal she was watching was certainly rather large.
MESSAGE.Translation: The stuffed animal she was watching was certainly rather large.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ハムスターかなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It looks like a hamster.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It looks like a hamster.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それにしては目つきが凶悪のような…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But it has a rather wild look on its face...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But it has a rather wild look on its face...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ひぃ、ふぅ、みぃ、よ、いつ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝One, two, three, four, five.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝One, two, three, four, five.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ゼロが五つ並んでいますよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Five zeros on the price tag.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Five zeros on the price tag.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そりゃ、すごい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's so pricey.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's so pricey.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …誰が買うんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Who in the world would buy it?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Who in the world would buy it?

MESSAGE.JP: よく見ると、毛にはつやがなくて長い間売れてないみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Taking a close look, its fur seemed to have lost most of its gloss from sitting there for a long time.
MESSAGE.Translation: Taking a close look, its fur seemed to have lost most of its gloss from sitting there for a long time.

MESSAGE.JP: 可愛い、とは言えないしなあ。
MESSAGE.EN: No wonder, because it wasn't exactly... cute.
MESSAGE.Translation: No wonder, because it wasn't exactly... cute.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…もしかして、欲しいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You happen to want that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You happen to want that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「まさか、それはないです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No way, I do not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No way, I do not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あっても置き場所に困りますから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I don't have enough room for it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I don't have enough room for it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そうだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...True.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...True.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「本を置く場所が優先です…残念ながら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Books are my first priority... unfortunately.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Books are my first priority... unfortunately.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …そうじゃなかったら、欲しいのかな。やっぱり。
MESSAGE.EN: ...If they weren't, would she get it...?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...If they weren't, would she get it...?

MESSAGE.JP: 街で一番大きな本屋の前に来る。
MESSAGE.EN: We arrived right in front of the biggest bookstore in town.
MESSAGE.Translation: We arrived right in front of the biggest bookstore in town.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの足が、まるで隣りに僕がいないかのように扉の方に向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: And she headed for the entrance of the store, as if she had forgotten that I was with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: And she headed for the entrance of the store, as if she had forgotten that I was with her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あっ、待ってよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, wait.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, wait.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 自動ドアの前で立ち止まる西園さん。
MESSAGE.EN: She stopped in front of the automatic doors.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stopped in front of the automatic doors.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's up with you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's up with you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…今日は寄らないつもりでしたのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I wasn't going to come by here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I wasn't going to come by here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「自然に足が向かってしまった、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But your feet naturally took you here, huh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But your feet naturally took you here, huh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あはは、西園さんらしいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ahaha, that's so like you, Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ahaha, that's so like you, Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…行きましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Let's go somewhere else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Let's go somewhere else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 扉が開く前に、その場を離れようとする。
MESSAGE.EN: She tried to leave before the doors could open.
MESSAGE.Translation: She tried to leave before the doors could open.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そう？　折角だから入ろうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How come? Might as well have a quick look inside since we're already here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How come? Might as well have a quick look inside since we're already here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 自動ドアの向こうには、広い空間が広がっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Beyond the automatic doors was a wide open space.
MESSAGE.Translation: Beyond the automatic doors was a wide open space.

MESSAGE.JP: 休日の店内は、かなりの賑わいを見せていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The store was quite crowded with people enjoying their holiday shopping.
MESSAGE.Translation: The store was quite crowded with people enjoying their holiday shopping.

MESSAGE.JP: 整然と並ぶ本棚に詰まった本の数々、そして入り口の近く、一番目立つところには新刊の書籍が平台に並んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: A number of book-filled shelves stood in neat rows, and the latest titles could be found on the display rack located in the prime spot near the entrance.
MESSAGE.Translation: A number of book-filled shelves stood in neat rows, and the latest titles could be found on the display rack located in the prime spot near the entrance.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕に少し遅れて、西園さんが入ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Following me, Nishizono-san came in.
MESSAGE.Translation: Following me, Nishizono-san came in.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ああっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Ahh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Ahh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …早速、ふらふらと近づいて一冊の本を手に取る。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And immediately she tottered to a book and picked it up.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And immediately she tottered to a book and picked it up.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「もう出ていたのですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's already come out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's already come out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ああ、この人の新刊も…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And this is a new piece by that author...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And this is a new piece by that author...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…あっ、これは探していた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Oh, and this is the one I've been looking for.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Oh, and this is the one I've been looking for.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あちらの方は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝What is over there...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝What is over there...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 蜜を求めて花畑を飛び回る蝶みたいに、西園さんの姿は店内に消えていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like a bee fluttering around a flower field for nectar, her figure disappeared from my sight.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like a bee fluttering around a flower field for nectar, her figure disappeared from my sight.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…失礼しました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しばらくして、西園さんが戻ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She came back to me a few minutes later.
MESSAGE.Translation: She came back to me a few minutes later.

MESSAGE.JP: 思わず、苦笑してしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: I found my mouth curving into a bitter smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: I found my mouth curving into a bitter smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「寄らないって言ってたのにね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even though you said you weren't going to come here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even though you said you weren't going to come here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…お恥ずかしい限りです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I'm very ashamed of myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I'm very ashamed of myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「買わないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aren't you buying any?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aren't you buying any?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの手には一冊の本もない。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't have a book in her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't have a book in her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…はい、今日は止めておきます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...No, I'm not today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...No, I'm not today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why not?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why not?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「もしわたしが買うとなると、直枝さんにも荷物を持っていただくことになりますよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If I shopped here, you'd have to help me carry the stuff.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If I shopped here, you'd have to help me carry the stuff.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そのくらい、お安い御用だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's easy enough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's easy enough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…たくさんですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...It would be a lot of them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...It would be a lot of them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そんなに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...That much?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...That much?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい、そんなに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes, that much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes, that much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 非力な西園さんが持てるんだから、多分大丈夫だと思いたいけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I should think I'd be all right even carrying something that was too heavy for the frail Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should think I'd be all right even carrying something that was too heavy for the frail Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 棚に並ぶ本を見ると、薄い紙でも重ねると分厚くなるんだなあ、と理解する。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking at the books in the shelves, I realized even thin ones would make a thick stack when put together.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking at the books in the shelves, I realized even thin ones would make a thick stack when put together.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…まだ付き合っていただきたいところもありますので」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...There's one more place that I'd like to take you to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...There's one more place that I'd like to take you to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「今日は本当に結構です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝So I'm really fine with not buying anything today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝So I'm really fine with not buying anything today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、またにしようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then maybe next time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then maybe next time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その機会があれば…。
MESSAGE.EN: Only if I have the opportunity...
MESSAGE.Translation: Only if I have the opportunity...

MESSAGE.JP: いや、今度は自分から作ろう。
MESSAGE.EN: No, I should make my own opportunity.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, I should make my own opportunity.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんと出かける機会を。
MESSAGE.EN: A chance to go out with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: A chance to go out with her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「せっかくだから、僕は何か買っていくよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But since we came here, I'll buy something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But since we came here, I'll buy something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何かお薦めはあるかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Any recommendations?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Any recommendations?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの目がきらりと光った気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt like her eyes flashed.
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt like her eyes flashed.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「任せてください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You can count on me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You can count on me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そして、色とりどりの海藻の森を縫って泳ぐ魚のように、西園さんの姿は再び店内に消えていく。
MESSAGE.EN: And yet again she vanished from sight, like a fish swimming in a forest of colorful seaweed.
MESSAGE.Translation: And yet again she vanished from sight, like a fish swimming in a forest of colorful seaweed.

MESSAGE.JP: その細腕のどこに、そんな力があるのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though she didn't at all appear that strong...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though she didn't at all appear that strong...

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「お待たせしました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Thank you for waiting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Thank you for waiting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん。いや、待ったっていうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y-yeah. Well, I don't know about waiting...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y-yeah. Well, I don't know about waiting...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 両手いっぱいに本を抱えて、西園さんが戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She returned back with books piled up against her chest.
MESSAGE.Translation: She returned back with books piled up against her chest.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「さすが、ここは品揃えが豊富ですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝This store sure has a broad range of books.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝This store sure has a broad range of books.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「探し甲斐がありました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It was worth fishing around.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It was worth fishing around.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「目移りしてしまって、大変です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Too many to choose quickly, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Too many to choose quickly, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …なかなか帰ってこなかったからなあ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Right, it took her rather long to get back here.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Right, it took her rather long to get back here.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「お薦め、と言うことでしたが数が絞りきれません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You asked for recommendations, but it was hard for me to limit it to a few.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You asked for recommendations, but it was hard for me to limit it to a few.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…あれもこれも、と探していたらついつい時間が経ってしまいました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I spent a lot of time looking for all sorts of books before I knew it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I spent a lot of time looking for all sorts of books before I knew it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「結局、置いていない本も幾つかありましたし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And in the end, it turned out that they were not selling some I wanted you to try.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And in the end, it turned out that they were not selling some I wanted you to try.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「では…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Well then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Well then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: こほん、と咳払いをして手に持った本の説明を始める。
MESSAGE.EN: She cleared her throat and started describing the books in her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: She cleared her throat and started describing the books in her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「これは日常の謎、と呼ばれるジャンルの先駆的な作品です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝This piece falls into the genre called everyday mystery.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝This piece falls into the genre called everyday mystery.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「謎解きとしてだけでなく、お話としてもとても素敵なんですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's not just a mystery, it's also a very wonderful story.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's not just a mystery, it's also a very wonderful story.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本の山の一番上。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the paperback on the top of the pile.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the paperback on the top of the pile.

MESSAGE.JP: …その文庫本の表紙には淡いタッチで女の子が描かれている。
MESSAGE.EN: ...There was a girl drawn in pastel colors on the front cover.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...There was a girl drawn in pastel colors on the front cover.

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっと不思議なタイトルが印象的だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Its somewhat unusual title drew my attention.
MESSAGE.Translation: Its somewhat unusual title drew my attention.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな風にして、西園さんの説明は続く。
MESSAGE.EN: Like that, she continued to explain.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like that, she continued to explain.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「密室物といったら、やはりこれは外せないでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝When it comes to a closed room mystery, you really must check this one out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝When it comes to a closed room mystery, you really must check this one out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「意外な凶器、という点でも群を抜いています」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The deadly weapon used in it is far more unpredictable than any other in the other ones.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The deadly weapon used in it is far more unpredictable than any other in the other ones.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本を手に持ったままだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was still holding all those books in her arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was still holding all those books in her arms.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「単純明快、それでいて誰も気づかない盲点。この本のトリックは日本のミステリの歴史を変えたと言っても過言ではありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's straightforwardly simple, but in a blind spot few can figure out. It wouldn't be an overstatement to say that the tricks in the book have made the history of mystery.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's straightforwardly simple, but in a blind spot few can figure out. It wouldn't be an overstatement to say that the tricks in the book have made the history of mystery.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いくら文庫とはいえ、重くないのかなあ。
MESSAGE.EN: They must have been heavy enough though they were all paperbacks.
MESSAGE.Translation: They must have been heavy enough though they were all paperbacks.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「館物といえば…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If you like cases set in a mansion...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If you like cases set in a mansion...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とつとつと、でも楽しそうに。
MESSAGE.EN: In a halting way, but cheerfully.
MESSAGE.Translation: In a halting way, but cheerfully.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「これは女性の心理に触れた意外な動機に驚くこと間違いないです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm sure you will be surprised by the psychology of the female mind as it relates to the murders in this one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm sure you will be surprised by the psychology of the female mind as it relates to the murders in this one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは、話を続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: She kept going.
MESSAGE.Translation: She kept going.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「古典的な名作も、抑えておきたいところです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And I'd like you to try several classical pieces, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And I'd like you to try several classical pieces, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「悲劇シリーズは『Ｙ』が有名ですが、わたしは『Ｘ』の方が好きです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝In the tragedy series, ❛Y❜ is very well known, but I personally prefer ❛X.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝In the tragedy series, ❛Y❜ is very well known, but I personally prefer ❛X.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「二十面相や少年探偵物と聞くと子供向けのように思われがちですが、実はかなりエログロに満ちていたりします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝People think that the Mystery Man of Twenty Faces or the Adolescent Detective Gang series are for kids, but those works actually include some fairly obscene content.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝People think that the Mystery Man of Twenty Faces or the Adolescent Detective Gang series are for kids, but those works actually include some fairly obscene content.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それに…乱歩は少年愛に関心を持っていることを公言していたくらいですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And... Rampo himself confessed that he was interested in pederasty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And... Rampo himself confessed that he was interested in pederasty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「入門編としても最適かと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝His works are very suitable for beginners...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝His works are very suitable for beginners...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本当に本が好きなんだなあ。
MESSAGE.EN: She really loved those books.
MESSAGE.Translation: She really loved those books.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「さて、ミステリばかりお薦めしていると偏りが出てしまいます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Well, I guess I should stop recommending any more mysteries.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Well, I guess I should stop recommending any more mysteries.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ファンタジー、ＳＦ、モダンホラー、歴史物、純文学、日本の作家、海外の作家、ジャンルに囚われる必要はありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Fantasy, Sci-Fi, modern horror, historical fiction, classical literature, works by Japanese authors, works by foreign authors; there sure are a lot of genres to choose from.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Fantasy, Sci-Fi, modern horror, historical fiction, classical literature, works by Japanese authors, works by foreign authors; there sure are a lot of genres to choose from.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「読んだ本の数だけ、世界が広がります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The more books you read, the wider your world gets.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The more books you read, the wider your world gets.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの笑顔が僕の心を奪う。
MESSAGE.EN: Her smile preoccupied my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her smile preoccupied my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: その顔を、もっとずっと見ていたい。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to keep seeing that smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to keep seeing that smile.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん、聞いていますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, are you with me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, are you with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝S-sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S-sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…よく聞いてくださいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I need you to listen carefully.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I need you to listen carefully.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありがとう、色々と選んでくれて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thank you for helping me select the books.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thank you for helping me select the books.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ただ、…そんなにたくさんは買えないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But... I can't afford all of those.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But... I can't afford all of those.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「お金もないし、持って歩けないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't have enough money, and even if I did, I wouldn't be able to carry them to the dorm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't have enough money, and even if I did, I wouldn't be able to carry them to the dorm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…もちろんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Of course not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Of course not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「なにも、今ここですべて買う必要はありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You don't have to buy them all right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You don't have to buy them all right now.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm just...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm just...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そこで西園さんは不意に言葉を詰まらせる。
MESSAGE.EN: Unexpectedly she was at a loss for the following words.
MESSAGE.Translation: Unexpectedly she was at a loss for the following words.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうかしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いえ…ご紹介した本は、ゆっくりで構いません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Never mind... You can take your time with the books I recommended.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Never mind... You can take your time with the books I recommended.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「少しずつ、読んでみてください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Enjoy each of them little by little.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Enjoy each of them little by little.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、それはもちろん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure, I will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure, I will.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さんからも借りなくちゃね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And I must borrow some more from you later, Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And I must borrow some more from you later, Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: その言葉に応えず、西園さんが言う。
MESSAGE.EN: Without replying to my statement, she asked.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without replying to my statement, she asked.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「さて、どれにしましょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝So, which one do you want to read?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝So, which one do you want to read?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん、そうだなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm, let me see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm, let me see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: どれも興味は惹かれるけれど…ちょっと迷った末に僕は一番上の本を選んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: They looked all engaging... Nevertheless, I chose the one on the top after a minute's hesitation.
MESSAGE.Translation: They looked all engaging... Nevertheless, I chose the one on the top after a minute's hesitation.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これにするよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll take this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll take this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女の子の絵…じゃなくて、ちょっと変わったタイトルに惹かれたからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The reason for the choice was because of its unusual title... not the girl painted on the cover.
MESSAGE.Translation: The reason for the choice was because of its unusual title... not the girl painted on the cover.

MESSAGE.JP: レジに並んで、その文庫本を買った。
MESSAGE.EN: I went to the cashier to pay for the paperback.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went to the cashier to pay for the paperback.

MESSAGE.JP: これで鞄の中には三冊。
MESSAGE.EN: With this one, I now had three books in my bag in all.
MESSAGE.Translation: With this one, I now had three books in my bag in all.

MESSAGE.JP: …すぐには全部読めないかも。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was probably going to take a while to finish them all.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was probably going to take a while to finish them all.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それにしても、たくさんの本があるよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There really are a lot of books here, I do say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There really are a lot of books here, I do say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 改めて周りを眺める。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked around the store yet again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked around the store yet again.

MESSAGE.JP: 広くて明るい店内には、たくさんの小説や雑誌、漫画が置いてある。
MESSAGE.EN: The wide and well-lit store contained all kinds of books in it: novels, magazines, manga,
MESSAGE.Translation: The wide and well-lit store contained all kinds of books in it: novels, magazines, manga,

MESSAGE.JP: 最新のベストセラー、店員のお薦め、参考書のコーナー等々。
MESSAGE.EN: the latest bestsellers, staff's recommendations, study guides, etc. etc.
MESSAGE.Translation: the latest bestsellers, staff's recommendations, study guides, etc. etc.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「誰にも目を向けられないまま返品されてしまう本も、きっと多いことでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝On the other hand, there are surely quite a number of books that get returned without anyone even looking at them...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝On the other hand, there are surely quite a number of books that get returned without anyone even looking at them...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしは思うことがあります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝There is something that's been on my mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝There is something that's been on my mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「今までに出版された本をすべて読むことができればいいのに、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If only I could read all the books that have been published so far.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If only I could read all the books that have been published so far.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ここに並べられている本を全部読むだけでも…わたしの人生は短すぎるんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝My life is too short... even to read all the ones lined up in here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝My life is too short... even to read all the ones lined up in here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それは…とても哀しいことだと…思いませんか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's... a very sad thing... don't you think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's... a very sad thing... don't you think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さんは、どうして本が好きなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why do you like reading?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why do you like reading?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本好きの人ならきっと一度は訊かれたことがあるんじゃないか、という質問だ。
MESSAGE.EN: This must be a question which any book lover has been asked at least once.
MESSAGE.Translation: This must be a question which any book lover has been asked at least once.

MESSAGE.JP: もしかしたら、愚問だったかも知れない。
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps it was a silly thing to ask.
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps it was a silly thing to ask.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「『小説が書かれ、そして読まれるのは人生がただ一度であることへの抗議からである』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝❛The reason why people write novels and read them is to lament the fact that they can live their lives only once.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝❛The reason why people write novels and read them is to lament the fact that they can live their lives only once.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしの好きな作家の言葉です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's what my favorite author said.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's what my favorite author said.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「本を読んでいる間は、その主人公になれるような気がする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I feel like I'm a protagonist of a book when I'm reading it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I feel like I'm a protagonist of a book when I'm reading it.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…わたしは、二人分の人生を生きるために本を読んできたのかも知れません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Maybe I read books because I wish to live two kinds of lives.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Maybe I read books because I wish to live two kinds of lives.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それは僕に聞かせるというよりも、独り言のような呟きだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her remarks sounded as though she was talking to herself, rather than me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her remarks sounded as though she was talking to herself, rather than me.

MESSAGE.JP: 少し早い昼食を、実は西園さんは初めて入るというハンバーガー屋さんで食べる。
MESSAGE.EN: We decided to have an early lunch at a burger joint, since she had never been to one before.
MESSAGE.Translation: We decided to have an early lunch at a burger joint, since she had never been to one before.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝......❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…酸っぱいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...It's sour.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...It's sour.❞

MESSAGE.JP: どうやらピクルスをかじったみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Apparently she had bit on a piece of pickle.
MESSAGE.Translation: Apparently she had bit on a piece of pickle.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「苦手なら抜いてもらえば良かったのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You could have had them removed from your burger.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You could have had them removed from your burger.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そんなことができるなら、最初に言ってください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You should've told me that before I ordered.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You should've told me that before I ordered.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん。ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝T-true. Sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝T-true. Sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これ飲んで、口直ししてよ。まだ口はつけてないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Have my drink to remove the bad taste. I haven't touched it yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Have my drink to remove the bad taste. I haven't touched it yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は自分のコーラのコップを渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: I handed over my cola to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I handed over my cola to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが頼んだのはホットコーヒーだから、一気には飲めないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Her drink was hot coffee, so it would have been hard for her to put much of it into her mouth in one single gulp.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her drink was hot coffee, so it would have been hard for her to put much of it into her mouth in one single gulp.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝......❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ど、どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝N-now what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝N-now what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「……ぷう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝......Pooh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝......Pooh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…酸っぱいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...It's sour.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...It's sour.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「炭酸なら炭酸と、最初に言ってください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You should've told me it was soda before I had it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You should've told me it was soda before I had it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ご、ごめん。炭酸も苦手だったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝S-sorry. I didn't know you don't like soda either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S-sorry. I didn't know you don't like soda either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…もう、知りません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I don't care anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I don't care anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それからも色々な場所を廻った。
MESSAGE.EN: We went around various places in the town.
MESSAGE.Translation: We went around various places in the town.

MESSAGE.JP: ショッピングモールで洋服やアクセサリを見たり、通りがかった画廊でやっていた個展を観たり。
MESSAGE.EN: Checking clothes or accessories at the shopping mall, or seeing a personal exhibition held at a gallery that we happened to chance upon.
MESSAGE.Translation: Checking clothes or accessories at the shopping mall, or seeing a personal exhibition held at a gallery that we happened to chance upon.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さすがにちょっと疲れたね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm kinda worn out, to be honest.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm kinda worn out, to be honest.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…恭介さんが聞いたら、きっと『おまえには根性が足りない』って言うんでしょうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I'm sure Kyousuke-san would say ❛You don't have enough spirit,❜ or something like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I'm sure Kyousuke-san would say ❛You don't have enough spirit,❜ or something like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あはは、そうかも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ahaha, that's likely.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ahaha, that's likely.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「鈴さんなら…『まったく理樹はしょうがないやつだ』とちょっと呆れた顔をするでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And Rin-san would say ❛You're hopeless, Riki❜ with a disapproving look.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And Rin-san would say ❛You're hopeless, Riki❜ with a disapproving look.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あはは、結構似てるかも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ahaha, that's just like her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ahaha, that's just like her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…西園さんも、僕らのことがわかってきたのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You seem to understand us better than ourselves.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You seem to understand us better than ourselves.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…あれだけ強烈な個性を持った人たちですから、嫌でもそうなりますよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Whether you want to or not, anybody would be affected if they are with people with such strong personalities.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Whether you want to or not, anybody would be affected if they are with people with such strong personalities.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 運ばれてきたアイスティに口をつけながら、僕らは話を続けた。
MESSAGE.EN: We had a leisurely talk over iced tea.
MESSAGE.Translation: We had a leisurely talk over iced tea.

MESSAGE.JP: いつになく、西園さんは多弁だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was being more talkative than usual and shared many of her thoughts and feelings.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was being more talkative than usual and shared many of her thoughts and feelings.

MESSAGE.JP: 本の話。
MESSAGE.EN: On books.
MESSAGE.Translation: On books.

MESSAGE.JP: お弁当の作り方。
MESSAGE.EN: How she liked to prepare her boxed lunches.
MESSAGE.Translation: How she liked to prepare her boxed lunches.

MESSAGE.JP: リトルバスターズの話もたくさん、した。
MESSAGE.EN: And, of course, her thoughts on the Little Busters.
MESSAGE.Translation: And, of course, her thoughts on the Little Busters.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人と謙吾の馬鹿話。
MESSAGE.EN: Silly things that Masato and Kengo had done.
MESSAGE.Translation: Silly things that Masato and Kengo had done.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介と僕の関係について。
MESSAGE.EN: The relationship between Kyousuke and me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The relationship between Kyousuke and me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…関係って？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What sort of relationship do you think I have with him?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What sort of relationship do you think I have with him?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「確かに、僕らはよくケンカみたいなことするけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I won't deny we fight at times.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I won't deny we fight at times.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「別に本当に仲が悪いわけじゃないよ」
