MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But it isn't because we really dislike each other.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But it isn't because we really dislike each other.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…それは分かっています」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「むしろ、その、仲が良いというか、なんというか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝On the contrary, well, I think you two are, how should I put it... very close to each other.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝On the contrary, well, I think you two are, how should I put it... very close to each other.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「子供の頃は、きっと恭介さんが直枝さんの手を取って、一緒に走ったりしたのでしょうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm sure he'd often take your hand and run around with you in your childhood.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm sure he'd often take your hand and run around with you in your childhood.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね、よくあったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, many times.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, many times.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ほぅ…手に手を取り合って、絡み合う視線と視線…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Sweet... You and him holding each other's hand, gazing into one another's eyes...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Sweet... You and him holding each other's hand, gazing into one another's eyes...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴とも随分仲良くなったこと。
MESSAGE.EN: How her friendship with Rin had grown.
MESSAGE.Translation: How her friendship with Rin had grown.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんの視線が相変わらず怪しいこと。
MESSAGE.EN: How Kurugaya-san's way of eyeing her was still alarming.
MESSAGE.Translation: How Kurugaya-san's way of eyeing her was still alarming.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんが、実は童話を書いているらしいこと。
MESSAGE.EN: How Komari-san seemed to be writing a fairy tale.
MESSAGE.Translation: How Komari-san seemed to be writing a fairy tale.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「書きかけのものを少し読ませていただいたのですが、とても素敵でしたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝She let me read her work. It wasn't finished yet, but I found it very wonderful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝She let me read her work. It wasn't finished yet, but I found it very wonderful.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「これは言ってしまって良かったのでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Maybe... I shouldn't have told you that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Maybe... I shouldn't have told you that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…神北さんには内緒にしていただけますか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Would you keep it secret from her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Would you keep it secret from her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドと一緒に遊んだこと。
MESSAGE.EN: Her playing with Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her playing with Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんが時々、とても寂しそうな顔をしているのが気になること。
MESSAGE.EN: Her being worried that Haruka-san seemed very lonely at times.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her being worried that Haruka-san seemed very lonely at times.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は主に昔の話をした。
MESSAGE.EN: What I shared was mostly based on my childhood.
MESSAGE.Translation: What I shared was mostly based on my childhood.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴と恭介、真人や謙吾との思い出話をすれば、話題が尽きることはない。
MESSAGE.EN: There were countless memories of my childhood friends to draw upon.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were countless memories of my childhood friends to draw upon.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…殺虫スプレーを噴き出しながら、ライターに火をつけたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...We set the bee hive ablaze with a lighter while spraying it with bug spray.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...We set the bee hive ablaze with a lighter while spraying it with bug spray.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ハチはやっつけたけど、真人も大変だったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We did manage to defeat all the bees, but Masato caught on fire as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We did manage to defeat all the bees, but Masato caught on fire as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴がなんとか鎮火させたんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin somehow put him out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin somehow put him out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鎮火って言っても、地面を蹴り転がし続けたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, she just kicked and rolled him around on the ground until the fire was gone, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, she just kicked and rolled him around on the ground until the fire was gone, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今から思うと、随分無茶したよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We were such a reckless bunch back then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We were such a reckless bunch back then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…今もあまり変わっていないように思います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I feel you people haven't really changed much in that respect.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I feel you people haven't really changed much in that respect.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あはは、そうかもね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ahaha, maybe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ahaha, maybe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「まったく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Honestly...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Honestly...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが苦笑する。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave a bitter smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave a bitter smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さんは、大切な想い出をたくさん持っているんですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You have a lot of precious memories.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You have a lot of precious memories.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…うん、そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah, I think so too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah, I think so too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いつまでも、きっと忘れられない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sure I won't forget any of them as long as I live.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sure I won't forget any of them as long as I live.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大切な宝物だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝They are all my invaluable treasure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝They are all my invaluable treasure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 自分で言って照れくさくなってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I said it myself, it made me feel embarrassed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I said it myself, it made me feel embarrassed.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これは恭介たちには内緒だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke and the others can't know anything about what I just said, all right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke and the others can't know anything about what I just said, all right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝All right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝All right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…直枝さんの弱みをゲットです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I've got your weak point.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I've got your weak point.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、これでおあいこだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then let's call it even now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then let's call it even now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: やがて。
MESSAGE.EN: Before so long,
MESSAGE.Translation: Before so long,

MESSAGE.JP: 時計の短針が四を差そうとする頃。
MESSAGE.EN: the short hand of the clock was almost on the four.
MESSAGE.Translation: the short hand of the clock was almost on the four.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん、今日はありがとうございました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, I appreciate everything you've done for me today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, I appreciate everything you've done for me today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが腰を上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She got to her feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: She got to her feet.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ううん、こっちこそ。今日は楽しかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝My pleasure. I had much fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝My pleasure. I had much fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「本当に…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I really do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I really do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そのまま黙りこんでしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: And then she went silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then she went silent.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What's up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What's up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「最後に、もうひとつだけお願いしていいですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Could you do me one last favor?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Could you do me one last favor?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「一緒に行きたい場所があるのですが、よろしいですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝There's a place I'd like to go with you, if that's alright.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝There's a place I'd like to go with you, if that's alright.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't understand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't understand.

MESSAGE.JP: 今日という楽しい日を締めくくる一言にしては、随分と寂しい表情をしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't understand why she had such a lonely expression on her face even though she had just suggested a place to put the finishing touch on this lovely day.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't understand why she had such a lonely expression on her face even though she had just suggested a place to put the finishing touch on this lovely day.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もちろん、行こうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Of course. Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Of course. Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…最初から、そこに行きたかったんでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You've wanted to go there all along, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You've wanted to go there all along, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の言葉に、西園さんは小さく頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave a slight nod.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave a slight nod.

MESSAGE.JP: ざぶり。
MESSAGE.EN: Splash.
MESSAGE.Translation: Splash.

MESSAGE.JP: ざばり。
MESSAGE.EN: Splish.
MESSAGE.Translation: Splish.

MESSAGE.JP: ざばりん。
MESSAGE.EN: Splish splash.
MESSAGE.Translation: Splish splash.

MESSAGE.JP: ざん。
MESSAGE.EN: Blop.
MESSAGE.Translation: Blop.

MESSAGE.JP: ざぶりん。
MESSAGE.EN: Splish splash.
MESSAGE.Translation: Splish splash.

MESSAGE.JP: 波音が唄うように、耳を打つ。
MESSAGE.EN: The song of the waves struck my ears.
MESSAGE.Translation: The song of the waves struck my ears.

MESSAGE.JP: 海が広がっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Blue water stretched out endlessly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Blue water stretched out endlessly.

MESSAGE.JP: 空が広がっている。
MESSAGE.EN: And so did the sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: And so did the sky.

MESSAGE.JP: 白い波が寄せていた。
MESSAGE.EN: A white wave lapped up on the shoreline.
MESSAGE.Translation: A white wave lapped up on the shoreline.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが行きたいと願った場所。
MESSAGE.EN: The place to which Nishizono-san had been longing to go...
MESSAGE.Translation: The place to which Nishizono-san had been longing to go...

MESSAGE.JP: そこは、海だった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...was the sea.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...was the sea.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「久しぶりに来たよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Been a while since I last came here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Been a while since I last came here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 歩いてこられる場所に海がありながら、ほとんど来た覚えがない。
MESSAGE.EN: Though our school was located only a short walk from the shore, I rarely did so.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though our school was located only a short walk from the shore, I rarely did so.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介たちとなら、いかにも遊ぶにもってこいの場所のはずなのに。
MESSAGE.EN: It was hard to believe that Kyousuke had never chosen this place to play.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was hard to believe that Kyousuke had never chosen this place to play.

MESSAGE.JP: なぜか、僕たち５人で一緒に海に来たことはなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know why, but my childhood friends and I had never been here together.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know why, but my childhood friends and I had never been here together.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…ここは、終わりの始まる場所ですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...This place is where ends begin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...This place is where ends begin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さんたちには、似合わないのでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝So I don't think it would have been suitable for you and your friends.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝So I don't think it would have been suitable for you and your friends.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それだけ言うと、西園さんはひとりで歩いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Saying only that, she started walking.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saying only that, she started walking.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねえ、どういうこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What do you mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What do you mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の呼びかけに、答えはなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't respond to my question.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't respond to my question.

MESSAGE.JP: 今日一日の気分の高揚が嘘みたいに――。
MESSAGE.EN: As though the light mood she had shown earlier was a lie...
MESSAGE.Translation: As though the light mood she had shown earlier was a lie...

MESSAGE.JP: いや、夢みたいに。
MESSAGE.EN: No, as though it was a dream.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, as though it was a dream.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは静かだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was very silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was very silent.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが、波打ち際にしゃがみ込む。
MESSAGE.EN: She squatted down at the edge of the surf.
MESSAGE.Translation: She squatted down at the edge of the surf.

MESSAGE.JP: 水を掬おうとするけれど、片手で日傘を持ったままで上手くいくはずもない。
MESSAGE.EN: But it proved to be a difficult task due to her holding her parasol in one hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it proved to be a difficult task due to her holding her parasol in one hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 手のひらの水は掬うそばから、海に還っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: The water fell out of her hand as soon as she lifted it up.
MESSAGE.Translation: The water fell out of her hand as soon as she lifted it up.

MESSAGE.JP: 水はこぼれるそばから、無限の海に溶けていく。
MESSAGE.EN: And merged back into the endless ocean.
MESSAGE.Translation: And merged back into the endless ocean.

MESSAGE.JP: 『海』は『水』に名前を変え。
MESSAGE.EN: The ❝ocean❞ turns into ❝water.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: The ❝ocean❞ turns into ❝water.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『水』は『海』に戻っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: And ❝water❞ returns to the ❝ocean.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: And ❝water❞ returns to the ❝ocean.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何が楽しいのか。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't see the point of her doing that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't see the point of her doing that.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは、そんな動作を何度も繰り返していた。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet she tried again and again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet she tried again and again.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: Then she finally got up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then she finally got up.

MESSAGE.JP: 規則的に寄せる波が、その足下に近づく。
MESSAGE.EN: A lapping wave was approaching her feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: A lapping wave was approaching her feet.

MESSAGE.JP: 濡れるか濡れないか、見ている僕の方がはらはらする。
MESSAGE.EN: I was worried whether it would soak her shoes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was worried whether it would soak her shoes.

MESSAGE.JP: まだ夏には早い季節。
MESSAGE.EN: It's still not quite summer yet.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's still not quite summer yet.

MESSAGE.JP: 浜辺にいるのは僕たちだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: We were the only ones on the shore.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were the only ones on the shore.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕と、西園さんのふたりだけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was her and I alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was her and I alone.

MESSAGE.JP: 今、西園さんは波打ち際にいる。
MESSAGE.EN: She was standing on the edge of the surf.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was standing on the edge of the surf.

MESSAGE.JP: ゆっくりと、僕を振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: She was, without a doubt, standing there.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was, without a doubt, standing there.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 口元が動いたけど、何と言ったかは分からなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I could see her mouth moving, but couldn't tell what she was saying.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could see her mouth moving, but couldn't tell what she was saying.

MESSAGE.JP: 青い空。
MESSAGE.EN: The blue sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: The blue sky.

MESSAGE.JP: 青い海。
MESSAGE.EN: The azure sea.
MESSAGE.Translation: The azure sea.

MESSAGE.JP: 白い砂。
MESSAGE.EN: White sands.
MESSAGE.Translation: White sands.

MESSAGE.JP: 白い体。
MESSAGE.EN: A white body.
MESSAGE.Translation: A white body.

MESSAGE.JP: その風景の中に、西園さんは立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was standing on the edge of the beach.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was standing on the edge of the beach.

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに、そこにいて。
MESSAGE.EN: She was, without a doubt, standing there.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was, without a doubt, standing there.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、溶けてしまいそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet she seemed to melt into the background.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet she seemed to melt into the background.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は目をこらす。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked far into the distance.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked far into the distance.

MESSAGE.JP: 海と空の交じわる彼方に、かすかに白い点がある。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a white pinprick far off where the sea crossed the sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a white pinprick far off where the sea crossed the sky.

MESSAGE.JP: 船だろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: It might just be the mast of a ship.
MESSAGE.Translation: It might just be the mast of a ship.

MESSAGE.JP: 近くならば見上げるほどに大きいだろうタンカーも、ここからでは霞むようにしか見えない。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if it was just a hazy speck from here, it might've been a tanker so huge that you'd have to look up in order to recognize it as a ship if you'd been next to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if it was just a hazy speck from here, it might've been a tanker so huge that you'd have to look up in order to recognize it as a ship if you'd been next to it.

MESSAGE.JP: 目を離せば、きっと見失ってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: You could easily lose track of it if you closed your eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: You could easily lose track of it if you closed your eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 今、僕から少しだけ離れた場所に立つ西園さんと同様に。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt it was the same for Nishizono-san even though she was standing just a short distance from me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt it was the same for Nishizono-san even though she was standing just a short distance from me.

MESSAGE.JP: はるか水平線の向こうも、わずか数メートルの距離も変わらず、同じように遠く思えた。
MESSAGE.EN: The distance between us felt as large as the one between the horizon and me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The distance between us felt as large as the one between the horizon and me.

MESSAGE.JP: 手が届かない、という等値だ。
MESSAGE.EN: They were both too far away for me to reach.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were both too far away for me to reach.

MESSAGE.JP: 風が吹いた。
MESSAGE.EN: The wind blew.
MESSAGE.Translation: The wind blew.

MESSAGE.JP: 浜風が海から陸に向かって一陣、僕の頬を撫でる。
MESSAGE.EN: It drifted from the sea to the shore, stroking my cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: It drifted from the sea to the shore, stroking my cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: 目に砂が入ってしまい、思わず目を閉じた。
MESSAGE.EN: A grain of sand got in my eye and I had to blink.
MESSAGE.Translation: A grain of sand got in my eye and I had to blink.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、それだけのことだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was for just a second.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was for just a second.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は水平線の狭間に浮かぶ影を二度と捉えることはできなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: However, I could no longer find the shadow floating on the horizon when I re-opened my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, I could no longer find the shadow floating on the horizon when I re-opened my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: そして――。
MESSAGE.EN: Then.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 思わず、大声を出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I yelled involuntary.
MESSAGE.Translation: I yelled involuntary.

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女は間違いなく、僕から見えるところにいるのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though she was, without doubt, in my sight,
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though she was, without doubt, in my sight,

MESSAGE.JP: 今見たのは、なんだったんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: what in the world had I just seen?
MESSAGE.Translation: what in the world had I just seen?

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「どうしたんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝What's the matter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝What's the matter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの声が小さく届いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her small voice reached my ears.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her small voice reached my ears.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は堪らなくなって、近づいていく。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't help but approach her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't help but approach her.

MESSAGE.JP: もっと声が聞きたいと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I just wanted to hear her voice again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I just wanted to hear her voice again.

MESSAGE.JP: 不安になった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was afraid.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was afraid.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんでもないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…馬が空を飛んでいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...A horse flying through the air.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...A horse flying through the air.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さんはそんなあり得ないものを見たような顔をしています」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The look on your face tells me that you just saw something just as impossible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The look on your face tells me that you just saw something just as impossible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…でも、一見あり得ないことでも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...But though it may seem impossible,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...But though it may seem impossible,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そこには…必ず理由があるんです。それがミステリというものです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝There is always... an explanation. That is what a mystery is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝There is always... an explanation. That is what a mystery is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瞬きするほどの間、西園さんが姿を消したようにみえたことにも理由が…あるというんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: If that was the case, then perhaps there was a reason for why she had seemed to vanish in the blink of an eye?
MESSAGE.Translation: If that was the case, then perhaps there was a reason for why she had seemed to vanish in the blink of an eye?

MESSAGE.JP: 深く考える必要はない。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't need to think hard about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't need to think hard about it.

MESSAGE.JP: さっき見たのは錯覚に過ぎない。
MESSAGE.EN: It must have been a trick of the eye.
MESSAGE.Translation: It must have been a trick of the eye.

MESSAGE.JP: 目に砂が入ったせいで、涙が出た。
MESSAGE.EN: The sand had made me tear.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sand had made me tear.

MESSAGE.JP: それで視界がにじんでしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: And those tears blurred my sight.
MESSAGE.Translation: And those tears blurred my sight.

MESSAGE.JP: ひどく物理的な理由。ただ、それだけのことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was nothing more than a common physical phenomenon. That's all there is to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was nothing more than a common physical phenomenon. That's all there is to it.

MESSAGE.JP: でも……。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet...
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet...

MESSAGE.JP: たとえ、そんな理由であっても、少しだけ涙を流したことが僕の感情に影響を与えているのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter what the actual reason was, even those few tears gave rise to a particular feeling.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter what the actual reason was, even those few tears gave rise to a particular feeling.

MESSAGE.JP: つまり。
MESSAGE.EN: In other words,
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words,

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は悲しくなってしまったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: they made me sad.
MESSAGE.Translation: they made me sad.

MESSAGE.JP: 隣に立つ西園さんの手をそっと握った。
MESSAGE.EN: I gently caught hold of her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gently caught hold of her hand.

MESSAGE.JP: やわらかくて、あたたかい。
MESSAGE.EN: It was soft and warm.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was soft and warm.

MESSAGE.JP: ああ――手が届いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, I could reach her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, I could reach her.

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに、ここにいる。
MESSAGE.EN: She was right next to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was right next to me.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: そっ、と。
MESSAGE.EN: Delicately,
MESSAGE.Translation: Delicately,

MESSAGE.JP: 右手に力がかかる。
MESSAGE.EN: she seized my hand in return.
MESSAGE.Translation: she seized my hand in return.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんからの無言の返事だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I took it as a wordless reply of hers.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took it as a wordless reply of hers.

MESSAGE.JP: この青く広がる海を前に。
MESSAGE.EN: In front of this wide, blue sea.
MESSAGE.Translation: In front of this wide, blue sea.

MESSAGE.JP: この青く広がる空を天に。
MESSAGE.EN: Under this wide, blue sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: Under this wide, blue sky.

MESSAGE.JP: 決して混じることのない青い海と白い鳥のように。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like the white bird can't become one with the sea.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like the white bird can't become one with the sea.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らは交わらない。
MESSAGE.EN: We two can't intersect.
MESSAGE.Translation: We two can't intersect.

MESSAGE.JP: 無限に近くて、永遠に遠い。
MESSAGE.EN: Infinitely close, but eternally distant.
MESSAGE.Translation: Infinitely close, but eternally distant.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、互いの存在だけを感じていた。
MESSAGE.EN: We are just sensing each other's existence.
MESSAGE.Translation: We are just sensing each other's existence.

MESSAGE.JP: 離れないように。
MESSAGE.EN: Trying not to move away from each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: Trying not to move away from each other.

MESSAGE.JP: たとえ、僕たちがこの世界では僅かな点に過ぎないとしても。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if both of us are only tiny dots in the world,
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if both of us are only tiny dots in the world,

MESSAGE.JP: 見失わないように。
MESSAGE.EN: in order not to lose sight of each other,
MESSAGE.Translation: in order not to lose sight of each other,

MESSAGE.JP: ぎゅっ、と。
MESSAGE.EN: I grasped her hand...
MESSAGE.Translation: I grasped her hand...

MESSAGE.JP: 手を握った。
MESSAGE.EN: ...strongly.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...strongly.

MESSAGE.JP: 汗ばんだ僕の右の手のひらと、しっとりとした西園さんの左の手のひら。
MESSAGE.EN: The sweaty palm of my right hand and the smoothness of her left hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sweaty palm of my right hand and the smoothness of her left hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 先に離したのは、西園さんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She let go of my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She let go of my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、何ごともなかったように。
MESSAGE.EN: Then as though nothing had happened.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then as though nothing had happened.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、ほんの少しだけ悲しそうな顔を僕に向けた。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned to face me with just the barest trace of sadness on her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She turned to face me with just the barest trace of sadness on her face.

MESSAGE.JP: その表情はすぐに消える。
MESSAGE.EN: The look quickly vanished.
MESSAGE.Translation: The look quickly vanished.

MESSAGE.JP: 声をかけようとした僕に先んじて、微笑みかける。
MESSAGE.EN: Before I could say anything, she started to speak with a smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before I could say anything, she started to speak with a smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「波の音を聞いていると、眠くなってきませんか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Doesn't the sound of the waves make you sleepy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Doesn't the sound of the waves make you sleepy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: それは、ことさら何でもないことのような声だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a nonchalant, ordinary voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a nonchalant, ordinary voice.

MESSAGE.JP: それから小さく、あくびをひとつ。
MESSAGE.EN: A small yawn came out of her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: A small yawn came out of her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 慌てて左手で口を隠す。
MESSAGE.EN: She hastily covered her mouth with her left hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She hastily covered her mouth with her left hand.

MESSAGE.JP: そのせいで、右手で持っていた傘が傾いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Because of that motion, the parasol in the other hand tilted.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because of that motion, the parasol in the other hand tilted.

MESSAGE.JP: 初夏の日射しが西園さんの顔に当たる。
MESSAGE.EN: And then her face got caught in the early summer sun.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then her face got caught in the early summer sun.

MESSAGE.JP: 色白い頬が桜色に染まる。
MESSAGE.EN: Her white cheeks became the color of cherry blossoms.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her white cheeks became the color of cherry blossoms.

MESSAGE.JP: 淡い美しさに、僕は見とれた。
MESSAGE.EN: The pale beauty of it enchanted me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The pale beauty of it enchanted me.

MESSAGE.JP: その桜色は、名を冠された花と同じようにすぐに散ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: However, that color soon withered away, just like the flower which was so used to describe it.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, that color soon withered away, just like the flower which was so used to describe it.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんがすぐに傘を元に戻したからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was because she had gotten the parasol back to its rightful position.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was because she had gotten the parasol back to its rightful position.

MESSAGE.JP: その時間は、ろうそくが燃え尽きる直前の一瞬のきらめきだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That moment was exactly the same as the last flicker of a candle as it burnt out.
MESSAGE.Translation: That moment was exactly the same as the last flicker of a candle as it burnt out.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らは防波堤に腰かけて海を眺めながら、他愛もないことを話していた。
MESSAGE.EN: We made small talk while sitting on the breakwater and watching the sea.
MESSAGE.Translation: We made small talk while sitting on the breakwater and watching the sea.

MESSAGE.JP: できることならば。
MESSAGE.EN: If only I could,
MESSAGE.Translation: If only I could,

MESSAGE.JP: ずっと、ずっとそうしていたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I would like to keep doing this forever.
MESSAGE.Translation: I would like to keep doing this forever.

MESSAGE.JP: でも…。
MESSAGE.EN: But...
MESSAGE.Translation: But...

MESSAGE.JP: 時間が過ぎるのは、速い。
MESSAGE.EN: Time had gone by in an instant.
MESSAGE.Translation: Time had gone by in an instant.

MESSAGE.JP: 手を握り合ったわずかな時間も、取り留めもないことを話した時間も過ぎ去ってしまえば、同じだけの時間だった。
MESSAGE.EN: In hindsight, both the long time we spent chatting and the short moment we spent holding hands felt like they took the exact same amount of time.
MESSAGE.Translation: In hindsight, both the long time we spent chatting and the short moment we spent holding hands felt like they took the exact same amount of time.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「今日はありがとうございました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Thank you for accompanying me today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Thank you for accompanying me today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今日という日の終わりを告げる、それが合図だった。
MESSAGE.EN: That was the signal that heralded the end of that day.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was the signal that heralded the end of that day.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I have one question.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I have one question.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そして、僕はずっと気になっていたことを訊くことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I steeled myself to ask a question that had been on my mind all day.
MESSAGE.Translation: I steeled myself to ask a question that had been on my mind all day.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今日は、どうして僕を誘ったのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why did you ask me out?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why did you ask me out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: どういうつもりで、西園さんが声をかけてきたのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Why had I been chosen as her companion for this trip?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why had I been chosen as her companion for this trip?

MESSAGE.JP: 結局、わからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even until the end, I still had not been able to figure it out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even until the end, I still had not been able to figure it out.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…どうして、でしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I wonder why.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I wonder why.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 首を傾げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She inclined her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She inclined her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ここに来るのは、ひとりで構わなかったはずなんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It shouldn't have mattered if I had come here alone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It shouldn't have mattered if I had come here alone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「でも、誰かと来たいと思ってしまった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝But I felt I wanted somebody to accompany me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝But I felt I wanted somebody to accompany me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…誰でも構わなかったはずなんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...It could have been anybody.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...It could have been anybody.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「能美さんでも、神北さんでも、来ヶ谷さんでも。別に井ノ原さんでも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Noumi-san, Kamikita-san, Kurugaya-san, and even Inohara-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Noumi-san, Kamikita-san, Kurugaya-san, and even Inohara-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「だけど、直枝さんと来たいと思ってしまった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝But I wanted to come here with you, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝But I wanted to come here with you, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…どうして、でしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I wonder why.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I wonder why.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それは独り言だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was talking to herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was talking to herself.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's because...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's because...❞

MESSAGE.JP: だから、僕も独り言で応える。
MESSAGE.EN: So I answered as if I was also talking to myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I answered as if I was also talking to myself.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕のことを好き、だから？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Because you like me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Because you like me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうだったらいいな、と思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I answered with what I hoped was the truth.
MESSAGE.Translation: I answered with what I hoped was the truth.

MESSAGE.JP: 胸が高鳴る。
MESSAGE.EN: My heartbeat quickened.
MESSAGE.Translation: My heartbeat quickened.

MESSAGE.JP: そうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, I got it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, I got it.

MESSAGE.JP: 気づいてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: I had just realized something.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had just realized something.

MESSAGE.JP: だって――、本当は――。
MESSAGE.EN: The actual reason why I hoped so was...
MESSAGE.Translation: The actual reason why I hoped so was...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が西園さんのことを――。
MESSAGE.EN: Because those were my feelings for her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because those were my feelings for her.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの顔が僕を捉える。
MESSAGE.EN: Her eyes captured me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her eyes captured me.

MESSAGE.JP: 怖かった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was afraid.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was afraid.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの口が開くのが。
MESSAGE.EN: I was afraid of the next thing she was going to say.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was afraid of the next thing she was going to say.

MESSAGE.JP: 次の言葉を聞くのが、怖くて耳をふさぎたいと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to cover my ears so I couldn't hear it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to cover my ears so I couldn't hear it.

MESSAGE.JP: だけど、聞いた。
MESSAGE.EN: But I listened to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I listened to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 聞かなくちゃいけなかったから。
MESSAGE.EN: Because I had to.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because I had to.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それは違います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's not it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's not it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 醒めた声が僕の耳を打った。
MESSAGE.EN: Her level words assaulted my ears.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her level words assaulted my ears.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あなたが覚えている感情は憐情です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The feeling you have for me is pity.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The feeling you have for me is pity.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「恋情ではありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's not love.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's not love.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あなたはわたしに同情しているだけです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You're just feeling sympathy for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You're just feeling sympathy for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんを急に遠くに感じる。
MESSAGE.EN: I suddenly started feeling like she was far away.
MESSAGE.Translation: I suddenly started feeling like she was far away.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は掴まえようと、慌てて手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: I hurriedly reached out to catch her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hurriedly reached out to catch her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうして、なんで僕が西園さんに同情しなくちゃいけないのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why must these feelings I have for you have to be sympathy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why must these feelings I have for you have to be sympathy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕は西園さんが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I just...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I just...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それ以上は言わないでください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Please say no more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Please say no more.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「最後にあなたとこの場所に来られて良かった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm really happy that I came here at the end with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm really happy that I came here at the end with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「リトルバスターズ、悪くなかったです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It wasn't so bad to be part of the Little Busters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It wasn't so bad to be part of the Little Busters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「せいぎの味方ではありませんでしたけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝They weren't exactly allies of justice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝They weren't exactly allies of justice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしの味方、でした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝But they were my friends.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝But they were my friends.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なにを言ってるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What are you talking about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What are you talking about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: もうお別れみたいな。
MESSAGE.EN: What she was saying...
MESSAGE.Translation: What she was saying...

MESSAGE.JP: そんな言葉を、西園さんは口にしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...sounded like parting words.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...sounded like parting words.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん、あなたも薄々感じていたはずです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, you should be somewhat aware of it too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, you should be somewhat aware of it too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「この数日の異変、クラスの人たちのよそよそしさが増していたこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Of the strange things that have happened for the past few days. How our classmates have treated me with more and more indifference.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Of the strange things that have happened for the past few days. How our classmates have treated me with more and more indifference.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「リトルバスターズの他のメンバーは、まだ大丈夫ですが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Looks like the other Little Busters aren't affected yet...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Looks like the other Little Busters aren't affected yet...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それも、今日まででしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝But I'm sure that by tomorrow they will be too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝But I'm sure that by tomorrow they will be too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そして、目撃されるもうひとりのわたし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And the other me, who is witnessed now and then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And the other me, who is witnessed now and then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「気づいてるでしょう？　何かが起こりそうだと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You already realized something is about to happen, didn't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You already realized something is about to happen, didn't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「だから、わたしに同情したんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And that's why you sympathized with me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And that's why you sympathized with me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さんが…消えてしまいそうに思えたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I thought... you were going to disappear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I thought... you were going to disappear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「試合が終わってからの西園さんの様子はおかしかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You've been acting weird after the baseball game.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You've been acting weird after the baseball game.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…それを気にするのが、いけないことだというの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Are you saying I shouldn't have been worried about that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Are you saying I shouldn't have been worried about that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは首を横に振る。
MESSAGE.EN: She shook her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shook her head.

MESSAGE.JP: ゆっくりと、僕の言葉を優しく否定した。
MESSAGE.EN: Slowly and kindly, she denied my words.
MESSAGE.Translation: Slowly and kindly, she denied my words.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「最後に、あなたと一日過ごせて楽しかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm really glad that I could spend my last day with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm really glad that I could spend my last day with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「最後って何を言ってるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What do you mean by your last day?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What do you mean by your last day?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まるで、もう会えないみたいな言い方じゃないかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It almost sounds like we can't see each other anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It almost sounds like we can't see each other anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「終わりは、いつだって海から始まるんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝All ends begin from the ocean.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝All ends begin from the ocean.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしは白鳥（しらとり）になりたいと思っていた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I wanted to become a white bird.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I wanted to become a white bird.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「彼女のように孤独で、気高く、美しく、誰とも交わらない存在に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝An entity that is isolated, elevated, beautiful, one that never crosses ways with another like her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝An entity that is isolated, elevated, beautiful, one that never crosses ways with another like her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そう、願ってた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's what I was longing to be.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's what I was longing to be.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そして、歌い上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: And then she recited it aloud.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then she recited it aloud.

MESSAGE.JP: あの短歌を――。
MESSAGE.EN: That poem...
MESSAGE.Translation: That poem...

MESSAGE.JP: 白鳥は哀しからずや空の青
MESSAGE.EN: Bird with wings of white, I wonder, is she not sad?
MESSAGE.Translation: Bird with wings of white, I wonder, is she not sad?

MESSAGE.JP: $dうみのあをにも染まず
MESSAGE.EN: $dLeft alone, ne'er touched
MESSAGE.Translation: $dLeft alone, ne'er touched

MESSAGE.JP: $dただよふ
MESSAGE.EN: $dby the blue of yonder sky, or the blue of hither sea.
MESSAGE.Translation: $dby the blue of yonder sky, or the blue of hither sea.

MESSAGE.JP: 始まりも終わりもなく。
MESSAGE.EN: No beginning nor an end.
MESSAGE.Translation: No beginning nor an end.

MESSAGE.JP: ずっと、そこにいる白鳥。
MESSAGE.EN: A white bird that just stayed there.
MESSAGE.Translation: A white bird that just stayed there.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「この二週間あまり、楽しかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝This past two weeks, they were amazing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝This past two weeks, they were amazing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…あなた達に出会ってから、わたしの決心はわずかに鈍ってしまっていました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...My determination had slightly wavered since I met you people.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...My determination had slightly wavered since I met you people.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「でも、それも今日でお終いです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝But not anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝But not anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 泣いている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was crying.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was crying.

MESSAGE.JP: 涙も流さず、声も震えていないけど。
MESSAGE.EN: There were no tears. Her voice did not quiver.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were no tears. Her voice did not quiver.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは、泣いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: But I knew she was crying.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I knew she was crying.

MESSAGE.JP: 最終幕が開ける。
MESSAGE.EN: The curtain was raised for the final act.
MESSAGE.Translation: The curtain was raised for the final act.

MESSAGE.JP: `少女@「やっと、会えた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝We finally met again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝We finally met again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 終幕を告げる声がした。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a voice declaring an end.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a voice declaring an end.

MESSAGE.JP: いつの間にいたのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: When did she show up?
MESSAGE.Translation: When did she show up?

MESSAGE.JP: 初めからそこにいた白鳥のように、少女は防波堤の上に立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: On the breakwater stood a girl, as though she had been there all along.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the breakwater stood a girl, as though she had been there all along.

MESSAGE.JP: 海を背にして、西園さんを前にして。
MESSAGE.EN: Her back facing to the sea, she was right in front of Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her back facing to the sea, she was right in front of Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 水平線に沈む夕日が逆光になって、少女の顔は陰となっているはずなのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Although the girl's face should have been silhouetted by the light of the setting sun sinking into the horizon,
MESSAGE.Translation: Although the girl's face should have been silhouetted by the light of the setting sun sinking into the horizon,

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の目にはっきりと届いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I could clearly make out her features.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could clearly make out her features.

MESSAGE.JP: まるで、こちら側が陰となってしまったみたいに。
MESSAGE.EN: On the contrary, it felt much like my face was cast in a shadow instead.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the contrary, it felt much like my face was cast in a shadow instead.

MESSAGE.JP: `少女@「はじめまして…じゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝Pleased to meet you... not that it's the first time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝Pleased to meet you... not that it's the first time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `少女@「一度、会ってるよね。理樹君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝We've met once, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝We've met once, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 少女は僕の名を口にする。
MESSAGE.EN: My name came out of her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: My name came out of her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: その響きは、とても親しげだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The way she spoke to me sounded very familiar.
MESSAGE.Translation: The way she spoke to me sounded very familiar.

MESSAGE.JP: 突然現れた少女に、僕の思考は追いつかない。
MESSAGE.EN: The appearance of the girl was so sudden that I couldn't immediately grasp what was going on.
MESSAGE.Translation: The appearance of the girl was so sudden that I couldn't immediately grasp what was going on.

MESSAGE.JP: どこかで会っているのか？
MESSAGE.EN: She said we had met before.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said we had met before.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は確かによく知っている。
MESSAGE.EN: I did know her very well.
MESSAGE.Translation: I did know her very well.

MESSAGE.JP: 今、目の前に立つ少女と同じ顔をした少女を。
MESSAGE.EN: I did know that girl who had the same face as this girl standing right in front of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I did know that girl who had the same face as this girl standing right in front of me.

MESSAGE.JP: その名は西園美魚というはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: And her name was supposed to be Mio Nishizono.
MESSAGE.Translation: And her name was supposed to be Mio Nishizono.

MESSAGE.JP: `少女@「久しぶりだね、美魚」
MESSAGE.EN: `Girl@❝Long time no see, Mio.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Girl@❝Long time no see, Mio.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 少女は笑いかける。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave a smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave a smile.

MESSAGE.JP: そこにあるのは、西園さんに会えたという純粋な喜びだった。
MESSAGE.EN: All that smile expressed was pure pleasure at the reunion with Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: All that smile expressed was pure pleasure at the reunion with Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 対する西園さんの顔は僕からは窺い知れない。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san's face, on the other hand, couldn't be seen from where I was.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san's face, on the other hand, couldn't be seen from where I was.

MESSAGE.JP: だから、想像するしかない。
MESSAGE.EN: Hence, all I could do was try to imagine her feelings.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hence, all I could do was try to imagine her feelings.

MESSAGE.JP: 喜んでいる？
MESSAGE.EN: Happiness?
MESSAGE.Translation: Happiness?

MESSAGE.JP: 悲しんでいる？
MESSAGE.EN: Sorrow?
MESSAGE.Translation: Sorrow?

MESSAGE.JP: 寂しそう？
MESSAGE.EN: Loneliness?
MESSAGE.Translation: Loneliness?

MESSAGE.JP: 怒っている？
MESSAGE.EN: Anger?
MESSAGE.Translation: Anger?

MESSAGE.JP: または――何も思っていない？
MESSAGE.EN: Or―― none at all?
MESSAGE.Translation: Or―― none at all?

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いつ以来でしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝How long has it been since our last meeting?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝How long has it been since our last meeting?❞

MESSAGE.JP: どこまでも静かな西園さんの声。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice sounded infinitely serene.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice sounded infinitely serene.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「美鳥」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Midori.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Midori.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みどり。
MESSAGE.EN: Midori.
MESSAGE.Translation: Midori.

MESSAGE.JP: 名を呼ばれた少女――美鳥が笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: The girl whose name had been just called... smiled again.
MESSAGE.Translation: The girl whose name had been just called... smiled again.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「いつだったかな。もう忘れちゃったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Not sure. I can't remember.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Not sure. I can't remember.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 興味のないことのように、呟く。
MESSAGE.EN: She murmured as if indifferent.
MESSAGE.Translation: She murmured as if indifferent.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「それよりも、もういいのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝That aside, are you done yet?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝That aside, are you done yet?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: She cast a glance at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She cast a glance at me.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「お別れの挨拶は終わった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Are you done saying your farewells?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Are you done saying your farewells?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そして、西園さんを見る。
MESSAGE.EN: And then she looked at Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then she looked at Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「そっか、じゃあ行こうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Good. Let's go then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Good. Let's go then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが美鳥の傍に立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san walked up to Midori.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san walked up to Midori.

MESSAGE.JP: …ふたりの会話が僕には理解できない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I didn't understand what they were talking about.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I didn't understand what they were talking about.

MESSAGE.JP: 美魚と美鳥。
MESSAGE.EN: Mio and Midori.
MESSAGE.Translation: Mio and Midori.

MESSAGE.JP: どういう間柄なのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: What was their deal?
MESSAGE.Translation: What was their deal?

MESSAGE.JP: 姉妹。もっと言えば、双子。
MESSAGE.EN: Sisters, or rather twins?
MESSAGE.Translation: Sisters, or rather twins?

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりの関係を言い表すのに、一番適した単語に思えた。
MESSAGE.EN: That seemed like the most appropriate way to describe their relationship.
MESSAGE.Translation: That seemed like the most appropriate way to describe their relationship.

MESSAGE.JP: だけど、西園さんに姉妹がいるという話は聞いたことがない。
MESSAGE.EN: However, I hadn't ever heard that Nishizono-san had a sister.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, I hadn't ever heard that Nishizono-san had a sister.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりの様子はそんな単純なものには見えない。
MESSAGE.EN: And something told me it wasn't that simple.
MESSAGE.Translation: And something told me it wasn't that simple.

MESSAGE.JP: …でも、今は考えている時じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But I had no time to think about that now.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But I had no time to think about that now.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっと、待ってよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait a minute.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait a minute.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 放っておいたら、何か取り返しの付かないことが起きる予感がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I had the feeling that if I were to let them go, something irreversible would happen.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had the feeling that if I were to let them go, something irreversible would happen.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん、行くってどこに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, where are you going?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, where are you going?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さんには…関係のないことです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's... none of your business...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's... none of your business...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「あはは、心配することなんて何もないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Ahaha, there's nothing to worry about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Ahaha, there's nothing to worry about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「別に取って食べようってわけじゃないんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I'm not going to capture and eat her, or anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I'm not going to capture and eat her, or anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「すぐに『西園さん』は戻ってくるから、ね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝❛Nishizono-san❜ will be back soon, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝❛Nishizono-san❜ will be back soon, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんに同意を求める。
MESSAGE.EN: Her tone requested affirmation from Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her tone requested affirmation from Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: でも西園さんは頷かずに、美鳥の目を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: But she didn't nod, just stared into Midori's eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: But she didn't nod, just stared into Midori's eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「美鳥…すみません。やっぱり…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Midori... I'm sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Midori... I'm sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「もう少し、待ってください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Can I please have a few more moments?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Can I please have a few more moments?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「もう、少しだけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Just a few more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Just a few more.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…ここに、いさせてください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Let me stay here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Let me stay here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小さな声。
MESSAGE.EN: A small voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: A small voice.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、悲痛な叫びだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was, however, an anguished cry.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was, however, an anguished cry.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 訳が分からない。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know what was happening.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know what was happening.

MESSAGE.JP: だけど、そんな声を聞いたら、じっとなんてしていられない。
MESSAGE.EN: But I wasn't able to stay still when I heard that tone of her voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I wasn't able to stay still when I heard that tone of her voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんに近づこうとした僕の前に美鳥が立ちはだかる。
MESSAGE.EN: Midori stepped in my way as I tried to approach Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Midori stepped in my way as I tried to approach Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「君のせいかなあ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Maybe it's because of you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Maybe it's because of you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 舐めるように、僕の顔を眺める。
MESSAGE.EN: She was critically examining my face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was critically examining my face.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「うーん、あんまりいい男とは思えないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Hmm, I don't think you're all that handsome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Hmm, I don't think you're all that handsome.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「こういうのが、美魚の好みなんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Mio, so he's your type, huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Mio, so he's your type, huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「ねえ、理樹君は美魚の恋人さんなんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Say, Riki-kun, you're her boyfriend, aren't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Say, Riki-kun, you're her boyfriend, aren't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…違うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さっき振られたばかりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had been just dumped.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had been just dumped.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「えー、嘘だよね。美魚？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Ehh, he's lying, isn't he, Mio?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Ehh, he's lying, isn't he, Mio?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「じゃなきゃ、待ってなんて言わないよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Otherwise, you wouldn't have asked me for more time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Otherwise, you wouldn't have asked me for more time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…嘘じゃありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...He is not lying.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...He is not lying.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さんは、なんの関係もありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝There's nothing between him and me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝There's nothing between him and me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ただの…お友達です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝He's... just a friend.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝He's... just a friend.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「…ふーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝...Oh yeah?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝...Oh yeah?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 詰まらなそうに笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: She sniggered as though bored.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sniggered as though bored.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「じゃあ、そういうことにしておくよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Well, let's leave it at that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Well, let's leave it at that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「早く美魚を解放してあげてね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You'd better set her free as soon as possible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You'd better set her free as soon as possible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「美魚のことが好きなら、それが美魚のためなんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝If you like her, you should do it for her sake.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝If you like her, you should do it for her sake.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「ね、理樹君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Got it, Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Got it, Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そして、美鳥は僕を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: And she looked at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: And she looked at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は、美鳥を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked back at her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked back at her.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、西園さんを見る。
MESSAGE.EN: And I looked at Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I looked at Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: そこにあるのは、ひどい違和感だ。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a terrible sense of incongruity.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a terrible sense of incongruity.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥に対して。
MESSAGE.EN: Between Midori.
MESSAGE.Translation: Between Midori.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、西園さんに対して。
MESSAGE.EN: And between Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: And between Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 間違い探し。
MESSAGE.EN: Spot the difference.
MESSAGE.Translation: Spot the difference.

MESSAGE.JP: ＡとＢ、ふたつの絵を比べて違う箇所を見つける遊びがある。
MESSAGE.EN: If there was a puzzle game where two versions of an image, A and B, were shown side by side, and a player had to find the difference between them.
MESSAGE.Translation: If there was a puzzle game where two versions of an image, A and B, were shown side by side, and a player had to find the difference between them.

MESSAGE.JP: 絵がひとつだけではゲームは成り立たない。
MESSAGE.EN: The game would require two different pictures.
MESSAGE.Translation: The game would require two different pictures.

MESSAGE.JP: ＡとＢ。それらは単独では何と言うことのない、ただの絵だ。
MESSAGE.EN: On their own, neither picture meant much.
MESSAGE.Translation: On their own, neither picture meant much.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたつを比べて、初めて成立するゲーム。
MESSAGE.EN: The game only had meaning if you looked at the pictures together.
MESSAGE.Translation: The game only had meaning if you looked at the pictures together.

MESSAGE.JP: 今なら分かる。
MESSAGE.EN: I could tell now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could tell now.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんがひとりでいる時は気づかなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I hadn't noticed it when Nishizono-san had been alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hadn't noticed it when Nishizono-san had been alone.

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっと変わっているけど、普通の女の子だと思っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd been thinking of her as a kind of unique, but ordinary girl.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd been thinking of her as a kind of unique, but ordinary girl.

MESSAGE.JP: でも。美鳥と対峙する西園さんには、確かにある。
MESSAGE.EN: But it was easy to recognize the differences when she and Midori were standing face to face.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it was easy to recognize the differences when she and Midori were standing face to face.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたつ並べて、初めてその絵がおかしいと気づくように。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like you'd only notice what was out of place between the pictures when you had them side by side,
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like you'd only notice what was out of place between the pictures when you had them side by side,

MESSAGE.JP: 何かが、違う。
MESSAGE.EN: I could see the differences between the two girls.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could see the differences between the two girls.

MESSAGE.JP: どちらも間違っていない、間違い探し。
MESSAGE.EN: If either was considered by herself, neither would seem out of place.
MESSAGE.Translation: If either was considered by herself, neither would seem out of place.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はその答えを探す。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to pick out the differences.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to pick out the differences.

MESSAGE.JP: 表情の作り方が違う。
MESSAGE.EN: Their expressions were very different.
MESSAGE.Translation: Their expressions were very different.

MESSAGE.JP: ひとりは日傘を持っていない。
MESSAGE.EN: One of them didn't have a parasol.
MESSAGE.Translation: One of them didn't have a parasol.

MESSAGE.JP: しゃべり方も性格も大分違う。
MESSAGE.EN: They were rather different in manner of speech and personality.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were rather different in manner of speech and personality.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは私服、美鳥は制服だ。
MESSAGE.EN: While Nishizono-san was wearing her own clothes, Midori was in her school uniform.
MESSAGE.Translation: While Nishizono-san was wearing her own clothes, Midori was in her school uniform.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんには僕がいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san had me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san had me.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥には誰もいない。
MESSAGE.EN: Midori had no one.
MESSAGE.Translation: Midori had no one.

MESSAGE.JP: 明らかに違う。
MESSAGE.EN: There were clear differences between them.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were clear differences between them.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥は西園さんじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: Midori wasn't Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Midori wasn't Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 間違い探しの答えは、あまりにも簡単すぎる。
MESSAGE.EN: It was no trouble whatsoever telling them apart.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was no trouble whatsoever telling them apart.

MESSAGE.JP: なのに。
MESSAGE.EN: However.
MESSAGE.Translation: However.

MESSAGE.JP: 同じだ。
MESSAGE.EN: They looked the same.
MESSAGE.Translation: They looked the same.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりは、どうしようもなく同じ。
MESSAGE.EN: They looked utterly identical.
MESSAGE.Translation: They looked utterly identical.

MESSAGE.JP: 鏡に映る像のように。
MESSAGE.EN: As if one was a real image and the other was a mirror image.
MESSAGE.Translation: As if one was a real image and the other was a mirror image.

MESSAGE.JP: どちらが実像？
MESSAGE.EN: But which one was the real one?
MESSAGE.Translation: But which one was the real one?

MESSAGE.JP: どちらが鏡像？
MESSAGE.EN: And which one was the mirror?
MESSAGE.Translation: And which one was the mirror?

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「ねえ、美魚」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Hey, Mio.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Hey, Mio.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「いつまで、日傘を差してるつもりなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝How long are you going to keep on using that parasol?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝How long are you going to keep on using that parasol?❞

MESSAGE.JP: その囁きに西園さんが持つ白い日傘が揺れた。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san's white parasol shook in response to her whisper.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san's white parasol shook in response to her whisper.

MESSAGE.JP: 日傘の作る大きな影も、一緒に揺れた。
MESSAGE.EN: And so did the large shadow it cast.
MESSAGE.Translation: And so did the large shadow it cast.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「いつまでも隠したままじゃいられないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You can't keep hiding it forever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You can't keep hiding it forever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「理樹君には知られたくないのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Did you want to keep it a secret from him?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Did you want to keep it a secret from him?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「でもね、無理だよ。あたしたちは双子なんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝But he'll soon find out, because we are twins.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝But he'll soon find out, because we are twins.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…いやっ。待って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...No, please wait.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...No, please wait.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「もう遅いと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I guess it's too late.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I guess it's too late.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「ほら、理樹君も気づいているよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝See, Riki-kun has already realized it, haven't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝See, Riki-kun has already realized it, haven't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「こうやって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝If we stand next to each other like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝If we stand next to each other like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥が近づく。
MESSAGE.EN: She moved over toward Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: She moved over toward Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「あたしたちが並べば、一目瞭然だよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝It will definitely be obvious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝It will definitely be obvious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「ねぇ、そうでしょ？　理樹君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Right, Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Right, Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥の言葉の通りだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Just as she had said,
MESSAGE.Translation: Just as she had said,

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はすでに気づいていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I had already discovered it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had already discovered it.

MESSAGE.JP: 影、だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Midori's shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Midori's shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥の影はおかしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Her shadow was weird.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her shadow was weird.

MESSAGE.JP: 夕日を背にして、彼女の影は僕らに向いている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was facing us with her back to the sun, therefore her shadow was stretching toward us.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was facing us with her back to the sun, therefore her shadow was stretching toward us.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の背後には、僕の長い影が伸びているはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: And so mine ought to be right behind me.
MESSAGE.Translation: And so mine ought to be right behind me.

MESSAGE.JP: でも。
MESSAGE.EN: However.
MESSAGE.Translation: However.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥の影は不自然に途切れている。
MESSAGE.EN: Something was wrong with her shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Something was wrong with her shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らに向かって、真っ直ぐと伸びているはずの影。
MESSAGE.EN: Her shadow which stretched across the ground straight toward us...
MESSAGE.Translation: Her shadow which stretched across the ground straight toward us...

MESSAGE.JP: その頭の部分だけない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...was missing its head.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...was missing its head.

MESSAGE.JP: いったん気づいてしまえば、簡単な答えだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was quite obvious once you had noticed it.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was quite obvious once you had noticed it.

MESSAGE.JP: 素肌の露出している部分だけ、美鳥の影はない。
MESSAGE.EN: The parts of her body exposed to the sun lacked a shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: The parts of her body exposed to the sun lacked a shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: そこだけ、地面が乾いている。
MESSAGE.EN: Only those areas of the ground were uncovered.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only those areas of the ground were uncovered.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「ねえ、理樹君は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Hey, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Hey, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 影のない少女が笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: The shadowless girl smiled at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The shadowless girl smiled at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんにそっくりで。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked just like Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked just like Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、西園さんじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: But she wasn't her.
MESSAGE.Translation: But she wasn't her.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが決して見せることのない、笑顔。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san never smiled liked that.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san never smiled liked that.

MESSAGE.JP: 正直に言おう。
MESSAGE.EN: I will be honest.
MESSAGE.Translation: I will be honest.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は、どきりとした。
MESSAGE.EN: The smile made my heart miss a beat.
MESSAGE.Translation: The smile made my heart miss a beat.

MESSAGE.JP: きれいだと、思った。
MESSAGE.EN: Beautiful, I thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: Beautiful, I thought.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「影のない女の子は嫌い？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Would you hate a girl if she didn't have a shadow?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Would you hate a girl if she didn't have a shadow?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 非現実的な問いかけ。
MESSAGE.EN: That was such an absurd question.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was such an absurd question.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の思考はその加速に追いつけない。
MESSAGE.EN: Everything was happening too fast for me to follow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everything was happening too fast for me to follow.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「答えてくれないの…。悲しいなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Stunned speechless...? That makes me sad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Stunned speechless...? That makes me sad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: よよ、と泣き真似を見せる。
MESSAGE.EN: She pretended to cry.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pretended to cry.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「でも、いっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Oh well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Oh well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「答えてくれないってことは、好きだっていう可能性もあるんだもんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Since you didn't answer me, I guess it's not out of the question that you actually like them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Since you didn't answer me, I guess it's not out of the question that you actually like them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「残念だったね、美魚」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝What a shame for you, Mio.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝What a shame for you, Mio.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「せっかくのチャンスだったのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You lost a huge chance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You lost a huge chance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥が西園さんの右手を掴む。
MESSAGE.EN: Midori seized Nishizono-san's right hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Midori seized Nishizono-san's right hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Uh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Uh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが背を向ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san turned her back to Midori.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san turned her back to Midori.

MESSAGE.JP: その場から逃げるように、海に向かって一歩踏み出す。
MESSAGE.EN: And she took one step toward the sea as if trying to escape.
MESSAGE.Translation: And she took one step toward the sea as if trying to escape.

MESSAGE.JP: でもそれよりも速く、美鳥の手が西園さんの右手を払った。
MESSAGE.EN: However, Midori tapped her right hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, Midori tapped her right hand.

MESSAGE.JP: からん、と乾いた音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard a dry sound of something hitting the sand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard a dry sound of something hitting the sand.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの右手に握られていた日傘が、地面に転がる。
MESSAGE.EN: The parasol Nishizono-san had been holding was now rolling on the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: The parasol Nishizono-san had been holding was now rolling on the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは追うこともなく、そのまま力なく立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san didn't move to pick it up. She just stood there weakly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san didn't move to pick it up. She just stood there weakly.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥が西園さんから離れる。
MESSAGE.EN: Midori moved away from Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Midori moved away from Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: ひとり立ちつくす西園さんを見せつけるように。
MESSAGE.EN: As if to allow me to focus on Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: As if to allow me to focus on Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の目には、西園さんしか映らない。
MESSAGE.EN: The sight of Nishizono-san filled my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sight of Nishizono-san filled my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは微動だにしなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't move at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't move at all.

MESSAGE.JP: 見なくても、もう分かっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I already knew without even looking.
MESSAGE.Translation: I already knew without even looking.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、見なくてはいけない。
MESSAGE.EN: But I had to look anyway.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I had to look anyway.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんには、影がない。
MESSAGE.EN: Behind Nishizono-san there was no shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Behind Nishizono-san there was no shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: ちょうど顔に当たる部分が、ぽっかりと空いている。
MESSAGE.EN: Where her head was supposed to be was completely empty.
MESSAGE.Translation: Where her head was supposed to be was completely empty.

MESSAGE.JP: それは…非現実的な光景だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't... believe my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't... believe my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「どうかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝What do you think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝What do you think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥が囁く。
MESSAGE.EN: She murmured.
MESSAGE.Translation: She murmured.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「これが、美魚の秘密」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝This is Mio's secret.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝This is Mio's secret.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「あたしと美魚、ふたりの秘密なの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Our secret.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Our secret.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の前に、美鳥が立った。
MESSAGE.EN: Midori moved over to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Midori moved over to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 比べるまでもなく、ふたりは似ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: It was obvious the two girls were much too alike.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was obvious the two girls were much too alike.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園美魚と美鳥。
MESSAGE.EN: Mio Nishizono and Midori.
MESSAGE.Translation: Mio Nishizono and Midori.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりとも、自分の影を持っていなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Neither of them had their own shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Neither of them had their own shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: 両者はまるで互いが互いの影であるように、そっくりだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was remarkably hard finding the differences in their outward appearances, since they both looked completely like each other's shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was remarkably hard finding the differences in their outward appearances, since they both looked completely like each other's shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の呼びかけに、西園さんは応えない。
MESSAGE.EN: She wouldn't answer me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She wouldn't answer me.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは僕を見ない。
MESSAGE.EN: She wouldn't meet my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: She wouldn't meet my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 目眩がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I began feeling dizzy.
MESSAGE.Translation: I began feeling dizzy.

MESSAGE.JP: くらくら、と。
MESSAGE.EN: My head was reeling.
MESSAGE.Translation: My head was reeling.

MESSAGE.JP: ふらふら、と。
MESSAGE.EN: My body was swaying.
MESSAGE.Translation: My body was swaying.

MESSAGE.JP: まずい。
MESSAGE.EN: This wasn't good.
MESSAGE.Translation: This wasn't good.

MESSAGE.JP: これは――予兆、だ。
MESSAGE.EN: This was a sign.
MESSAGE.Translation: This was a sign.

MESSAGE.JP: 終わりの、予感だ。
MESSAGE.EN: A sign of an end.
MESSAGE.Translation: A sign of an end.

MESSAGE.JP: 急速に世界が色を失い始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: The world started rapidly draining of color.
MESSAGE.Translation: The world started rapidly draining of color.

MESSAGE.JP: 茜に染まる夕焼けの空。
MESSAGE.EN: The sky dyed scarlet in the evening glow.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sky dyed scarlet in the evening glow.

MESSAGE.JP: 橙を映す夕暮れの海。
MESSAGE.EN: The sea reflecting the setting sun.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sea reflecting the setting sun.

MESSAGE.JP: オレンジに浮かぶ少女たち。
MESSAGE.EN: The two girls painted in orange.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two girls painted in orange.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱に燃える世界の色が消えていく。
MESSAGE.EN: All the colors were disappearing from the vermeil world.
MESSAGE.Translation: All the colors were disappearing from the vermeil world.

MESSAGE.JP: 全てが灰色に置き換えられていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Everything was becoming gray.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everything was becoming gray.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりの少女たちが、グレーに変わる。
MESSAGE.EN: So were the two girls.
MESSAGE.Translation: So were the two girls.

MESSAGE.JP: ああ、ふたりとも影であり、影がない。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, they were both shadows without shadows.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, they were both shadows without shadows.

MESSAGE.JP: 本当に、どこまでも似ていて。
MESSAGE.EN: They were exactly alike.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were exactly alike.

MESSAGE.JP: どこまでも違うふたり。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet completely different.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet completely different.

MESSAGE.JP: 意識が遠退く。
MESSAGE.EN: I was gradually slipping into oblivion.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was gradually slipping into oblivion.

MESSAGE.JP: もう、立っていられない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't stand any longer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't stand any longer.

MESSAGE.JP: 両膝が地面につく。
MESSAGE.EN: My knees buckled.
MESSAGE.Translation: My knees buckled.

MESSAGE.JP: 上体が倒れる音を遠くに聞いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I distantly heard my upper body tumble down.
MESSAGE.Translation: I distantly heard my upper body tumble down.

MESSAGE.JP: 頬にざらりとした感触がまとわりついた。
MESSAGE.EN: After that, I sensed something rough against my cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: After that, I sensed something rough against my cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: 世界が反転する。
MESSAGE.EN: The world turned upside down.
MESSAGE.Translation: The world turned upside down.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は眠りに落ちていく。
MESSAGE.EN: I was falling asleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was falling asleep.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…見ないで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Don't look at me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Don't look at me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が最後に聞いた言葉だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Those were her last words I heard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those were her last words I heard.

MESSAGE.JP: 目覚めは寮の布団の上だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was on my dorm bed as I arose.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was on my dorm bed as I arose.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ようやく起きたか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You finally woke up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You finally woke up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、おはよう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, morning...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, morning...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おはようじゃねえよ。今、何時だと思ってるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's no morning. Any idea what time it is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's no morning. Any idea what time it is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が時計を指す。
MESSAGE.EN: He pointed at the clock.
MESSAGE.Translation: He pointed at the clock.

MESSAGE.JP: すでに夜中、と言ってもいい時間だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was already almost midnight.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was already almost midnight.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 頭がうまく働かない。
MESSAGE.EN: My head was not working well.
MESSAGE.Translation: My head was not working well.

MESSAGE.JP: 寝起きのせいか、ぼおっとしているのが自分でもわかる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was spacing out because I'd just woken up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was spacing out because I'd just woken up.

MESSAGE.JP: もやがかった頭の中が晴れる気配はない。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no sign of the fog in my head clearing any time soon.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no sign of the fog in my head clearing any time soon.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ほら、これでも飲め」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Here, you might wanna drink this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Here, you might wanna drink this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人の差し出したコップを受け取る。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to accept a glass from him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to accept a glass from him.

MESSAGE.JP: だけど、あやうく落としそうになる。
MESSAGE.EN: But I almost dropped it.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I almost dropped it.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おいおい、気をつけろよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, careful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, careful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 取り直したコップに口をつける。
MESSAGE.EN: I regrasped the glass and raised the content into my mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: I regrasped the glass and raised the content into my mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 冷たい水が喉を通る感触が気持ちいい。
MESSAGE.EN: It was pleasant to feel the cold water running down through my throat.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was pleasant to feel the cold water running down through my throat.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…大丈夫か、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...You all right, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...You all right, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…西園と何かあったのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Did something happen between you and Nishizono?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Did something happen between you and Nishizono?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「にしぞの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうだ、今日は西園さんと一緒に出かけたんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I remembered that I had gone out with her today.
MESSAGE.Translation: I remembered that I had gone out with her today.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ううん、別に何も…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Not really...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Not really...❞

MESSAGE.JP: まだ頭がぼんやりしているせいか、いまいちはっきり思い出せない。
MESSAGE.EN: Because of my half-conscious state, I couldn't recall exactly what had happened during the trip.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because of my half-conscious state, I couldn't recall exactly what had happened during the trip.

MESSAGE.JP: 一緒に出かけて…。
MESSAGE.EN: Going out with her...
MESSAGE.Translation: Going out with her...

MESSAGE.JP: 何かあったんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: And what had come of it?
MESSAGE.Translation: And what had come of it?

MESSAGE.JP: 思い出せないってことは、多分大したことじゃないんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess I'd have remembered if it had been anything important.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess I'd have remembered if it had been anything important.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…そうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「西園がここまで運んでくれたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Nishizono carried you here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Nishizono carried you here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あいつ、見かけによらずに力があるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝She's stronger than she looks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝She's stronger than she looks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へえ、そうなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wow, is that so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wow, is that so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕も知らなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know that either.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know that either.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「さっきまで一緒だったんだが、門限がきたんでさすがに帰らせた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝She was here until just a moment ago, but I had her go back to her room due to the curfew.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝She was here until just a moment ago, but I had her go back to her room due to the curfew.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「大丈夫なら、メールでも打っておけよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝If you feel better now, you should text her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝If you feel better now, you should text her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ずいぶん心配してたからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝She was really worried about you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝She was really worried about you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I will.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それからすぐに、謙吾と恭介が部屋を訪ねてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo and Kyousuke came by our room a few minutes later.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo and Kyousuke came by our room a few minutes later.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「元気そうでなによりだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Glad you look fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Glad you look fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「おまえに怪我でもされると真人まで元気がなくなるだろうからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'm sure Masato'll feel down as well if you get injured.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'm sure Masato'll feel down as well if you get injured.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いや、おまえが何言ってんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Who are you to say such a thing with an injured arm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Who are you to say such a thing with an injured arm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ふっふ…確かにっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Huhu... Exactly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Huhu... Exactly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「あーーはっはっはっは！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Ah-hah-hah-hah-hah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Ah-hah-hah-hah-hah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんかおまえ、ラスボスみたいだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You're laughing like some final boss...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You're laughing like some final boss...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 心配してくれたのだろうけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: I knew he must have been worried about me...
MESSAGE.Translation: I knew he must have been worried about me...

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんだ、再起不能じゃなかったのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What, and here I thought you were finished.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What, and here I thought you were finished.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 元気そうな僕を見て、残念そうな声を出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Finding me doing well, he spoke in a rueful way.
MESSAGE.Translation: Finding me doing well, he spoke in a rueful way.

MESSAGE.JP: きっと、それほどに心配してくれたんだろう、と好意的な解釈を…。
MESSAGE.EN: He must have been that worried about me... I tried to take his statement in such a positive light...
MESSAGE.Translation: He must have been that worried about me... I tried to take his statement in such a positive light...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「するわけないじゃないかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't count me out yet!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't count me out yet!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「その元気なら、大丈夫だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You look quite fine. No need to be worried anymore, it seems.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You look quite fine. No need to be worried anymore, it seems.❞

MESSAGE.JP: また、突然眠ってしまったのか。
MESSAGE.EN: I must have fallen asleep suddenly again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I must have fallen asleep suddenly again.

MESSAGE.JP: しかも、今日は西園さんと一緒の時だったらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Furthermore, they said I had done it right in front of Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Furthermore, they said I had done it right in front of Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: …その瞬間を思い出そうとしても、どうしても思い出すことができない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I couldn't recall that moment even though I tried.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I couldn't recall that moment even though I tried.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは多分、僕のこの病気のことは知らなかっただろうから。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san probably hadn't known anything about my disease.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san probably hadn't known anything about my disease.

MESSAGE.JP: …きっと驚いただろうな。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Hence, my sudden slumber might have freaked her out.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Hence, my sudden slumber might have freaked her out.

MESSAGE.JP: 結局、いつもの如く騒ぎ出した恭介たちは、見回りに追い出されるまで僕らの部屋にいた。
MESSAGE.EN: After that we had a blast, as usual, until a patrol came by and kicked Kyousuke and Kengo out of the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: After that we had a blast, as usual, until a patrol came by and kicked Kyousuke and Kengo out of the room.

MESSAGE.JP: ベッドに入ってから、携帯を手にする。
MESSAGE.EN: I got into bed and grabbed my cellphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got into bed and grabbed my cellphone.

MESSAGE.JP: 騒ぎ疲れたのか、真人はすでに寝息を立てていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato must have been weary of playing, and was already fast asleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato must have been weary of playing, and was already fast asleep.

MESSAGE.JP: ほのかに光るディスプレイが手元をかすかに照らし出す。
MESSAGE.EN: The lambent glow of the display slightly illuminated my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: The lambent glow of the display slightly illuminated my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 親指でアドレス帳をたぐっていく。
MESSAGE.EN: I searched in the address book for her info.
MESSAGE.Translation: I searched in the address book for her info.

MESSAGE.JP: 『今日はありがとう。また、明日』
MESSAGE.EN: [Thank you for today. See you tomorrow.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Thank you for today. See you tomorrow.]

MESSAGE.JP: 送信ボタンを押して、しばらく待ってみる。
MESSAGE.EN: After sending, I waited for a reply from her a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: After sending, I waited for a reply from her a while.

MESSAGE.JP: 時間が遅いせいか、返信はなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I ended up not receiving one. She had probably already gone to sleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ended up not receiving one. She had probably already gone to sleep.

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、仕方ない。
MESSAGE.EN: That was not that big a deal, however.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was not that big a deal, however.

MESSAGE.JP: また、明日。明日会えるから。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyway, I would be able to see her tomorrow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyway, I would be able to see her tomorrow.

MESSAGE.JP: 今日は何だか疲れてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I hadn't been doing anything special,
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I hadn't been doing anything special,

MESSAGE.JP: 特に何があったというわけでもないはずなのに。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt utterly worn out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt utterly worn out.

MESSAGE.JP: 横になって目をつむると、眠りはすぐに訪れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I lay on my side, closed my eyes, and in no time was asleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: I lay on my side, closed my eyes, and in no time was asleep.
